programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 102 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Four more will punch their tickets into the next round as GLORY and RISE search for the baddest featherweight on the planet in this year long tournament. On the GLORY side, top ranked German Polish fighter Denis Wosik (40-9-1, 9 KO) takes on Thai veteran Suarek (107-40-11, 39 KO) and Italy’s Achraf Aasila (53-13, 13 KO) meets France’s Lounis Saing (19-4-1, 12 KO). Meanwhile on the RISE side of the bracket, Japan’s Yutaro Asahi (17-9, 4 KO) clashes with Spain’s Eduardo Catalin (17-3-1) and top Japanese prospect Yura Kono (15-1, 7 KO) goes up against China’s Dexiang Kong (35-10). In addition to the Last Featherweight Standing matchups, Shiro Matsumoto (53-17-4, 18 KO) defends his RISE...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: On the preliminary card, a 4-Man Featherweight Contender Tournament and other one-off bouts were featured.Mirko Cro Cop was first scheduled to face Pat Barry, and later Sergei Kharitonov on this card. However, on May 21, it was announced that Kharitonov had to withdraw from the fight due to injury. He was replaced by Jarrell Miller.Miguel Torres was scheduled to make his GLORY debut as a participant of the Featherweight tournament. However, on May 28, it was revealed he pulled out of the tournament for undisclosed reasons. He was replaced by Marcus Vinicius.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the worlds top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: At the ExCeL Arena in London, England on March 23, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Tyrone Spong and Remy Bonjasky as headliner, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Over the course of a year, twelve of the best GLORY featherweights will compete opposite twelve of the best RISE featherweights in a series of knockout bouts until one fighter becomes the Last Featherweight Standing.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: On the preliminary card, a 4-Man Featherweight Contender Tournament and other one-off bouts were featured.Mirko Cro Cop was first scheduled to face Pat Barry, and later Sergei Kharitonov on this card. However, on May 21, it was announced that Kharitonov had to withdraw from the fight due to injury. He was replaced by Jarrell Miller.Miguel Torres was scheduled to make his GLORY debut as a participant of the Featherweight tournament. However, on May 28, it was revealed he pulled out of the tournament for undisclosed reasons. He was replaced by Marcus Vinicius.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the worlds top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 100 Last Heavyweight Standing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.desc: Carp fishing definitely isnt something that you would immediately associate with a country that is better known for its stunning beaches, fragrant food and full moon parties.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Every year thousands of British carp anglers travel across the English Channel with their mates to partake in a carp fishing holiday.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Balkans have made a remarkable recovery considering how recently they were a war-torn part of the world, and now attract large numbers of tourists each year.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: The Extremadura region was where the Romans first introduced carp to Spain, and this rugged area now has a reputation for producing some massive ones from the huge lakes.

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Croatia has emerged as probably the best place in the world to go and catch a huge carp and will soon be producing fish in excess of 100lb, likely to break the World record.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs are pulling out all the stops in a bid for big scores with their mains.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The spotlight is on Scotland. Returning contenders Michael Smith, Tony Singh and Mark Greenaway are all determined to get one of their dishes to the banquet at the Royal Albert Hall to celebrate 25 years of Comic Reliefs Red Nose Day.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The competition continues as returning contenders Michael Smith, Tony Singh and Mark Greenaway cook their fish dishes. Will a traditional Scottish soup, or a chowder or a risky no cook mackerel dish impress veteran judge Angela Hartnett MBE?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The competition heats up as the three returning Scottish contenders Michael Smith, Tony Singh and Mark Greenaway cook their main courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Scottish returning contenders Michael Smith, Tony Sigh and Mark Greenaway have just one more chance to impress veteran judge Angela Hartnett MBE and win their place in front of the judges.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from Scotland. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the Great British Menu judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is the turn of three chefs from the North West. Returning contender Aiden Byrne is determined to go all the way. Hes up against two fiercely competitive newcomers Mary-Ellen McTague and Chris Holland both of whom are determined to make their mark.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs from the North West cook their fish courses. Will Aiden Byrnes The Culinary Joke - a take on a classic prawn cocktail raise a laugh? Or will Mary-Ellen McTagues dish of Dover sole or Chris Hollands Gone Fishing salmon dish prove winners?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs cook their main course. Will Aiden Byrnes witty beef dish entitled Long Horn Beef With Noodle Pot prove a winner? Or will Mary-Ellen McTagues goat dish called Our Kid or Chris Hollands dish called A Tasting of Pork score highly?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the North Wests chefs last chance to impress before the final two chefs are chosen to face the Great British Menu judging panel. Which dessert will help get two chefs through?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from the North West. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the curtain raiser as the Central chefs go all out. Three culinary heavyweights return, two Michelin star chef Daniel Clifford, Michelin star Richard Bainbridge and Will Holland who has beaten them both before in the Great British Menu kitchen.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs cook their fish courses. Daniel Clifford puts up a creative dish called Catch of the Day. Richard Bainbridges dish is titled Tongue in Cheek. And Will Hollands dish - Coconut poached brill, crab, celeriac and tomato essence.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs from the Central region cook their main courses. And veteran Marcus Wareing is looking for perfection.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the last chance for the chefs from the Central region to impress before the final two are chosen to face the Great British Menu judging panel. Which dessert will help get two chefs through?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from the Central region. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today nerves play a huge part as all three chefs from the South West, fresh to the competition, get to grips with their new environment. Chris Eden, Peter Sanchez-Iglesias and Emily Watkins cook their starters.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: In todays programme the South West chefs cook their fish courses. Cornishman Chris Eden takes inspiration from home to create a lobster and oyster dish called Gone Surfing.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the South West chefs cook their main course. And veteran Tom Kerridge is looking for perfection.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today is the chefs last chance to impress before the final two chefs are chosen to face the Great British Menu judging panel. Which dessert will help get two chefs from the South West region through?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from the South West. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the chefs from Wales raise the curtain with their starters, but which one is going to produce a showstopper? Returning contender Michelin star chef Richard Davies, experienced Mary Ann Gilchrist or young gun 19 year old Luke Thomas?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: In todays programme the chefs cook their fish course: Richard Davies serves up Grilled and tartare of mackerel, while Mary Ann Gilchrist serves a lobster dish. Luke Thomas takes on a classic fish finger called Haddock smoky and lobster fish finger.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today sees the chefs from Wales prepare their main course, but will any of them impress veteran Jeremy Lee enough to give them a top score?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today is the final chance for the chefs to impress Jeremy Lee with their dessert dishes. Which creation will help get two chefs through to the judging show?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs representing Wales. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the Great British Menu judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three returning contenders from the North East are reunited in a culinary rematch. Colin McGurran, Stephanie Moon and Charlie Lakin. The three North East chefs will be judged by a veteran of the competition Michelin star chef Jason Atherton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: In todays programme the chefs cook their fish courses. Will former champion Colin McGurrans dish inspired by his childhood memories, Cockles and Mussels with Salmon inspire veteran judge Jason Atherton?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the chefs from the North East region cook their main course. And veteran Jason Atherton is looking for perfection.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today is the chefs last chance to impress before the final two chefs are chosen to face the Great British Menu judging panel. Which dessert will help get two chefs through?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from the North East. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the turn of three chefs from Northern Ireland - Chris Fearon, Raymond McArdle, and Ian Orr - who will be judged by a veteran of the competition Michelin star chef Glynn Purnell.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The three Northern Ireland chefs cook their fish course. Chris Fearon serves up a creation called Stitched up like a kipper, Raymond McArdle serves Turbot called A day at the beach and Ian Orr creates a dish called Why did the scallop cross the roe.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its time for the main course. Chris Fearons dish called Cowboy supper is inspired by the Wild West. Raymond McArdle creates a dish called Titanic smoked venison, tongue and cheek while Ian Orr cooks lamb and baked hay.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today is the chefs last chance to impress before the final two chefs are chosen to face the Great British Menu judging panel. Which dessert will help get two chefs through?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its decision time for the chefs from Northern Ireland. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the Great British Menu judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E36 London and South East Starter
programme.desc: The curtain raises on London and the South East - newcomers Matt Gillan and Adam Simmonds come face-to-face with returning contender Tom Aikens. Today its the starter course and someone makes a schoolboy error.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E37 London and South East Fish
programme.desc: Today its the fish course and Tom and Matt battle it out with scallop dishes while Adam delivers Langoustine and Oysters. But who will come out on top?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E38 London and South East Main
programme.desc: Today its the main course. Rabbit, Rose veal and venison are all dished up for Great British Menu veteran Richard Corrigan. And one of the chefs is joined by Eastenders star June Brown for a fundraising challenge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E39 London and South East Dessert
programme.desc: Today its the dessert course, will a strawberry and coconut dessert, a frozen white chocolate dish or apple and cherries come out on top. Great British Menu veteran judge Richard Corrigan will decide who goes through to the judges.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E40 London and South East Judging
programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from London and the South East. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Actress Patricia Hodge, one of the stars of sit com Miranda will join judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort to taste all eight winning regional starter courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs cook their fish courses. Theyre all vying to finish in the top three and still be in with a chance of cooking at the special banquet.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Comedian Ade Edmondson tucks into the chefs main courses to help decide which three will remain in contention to cook at the special banquet. But the chefs are in for a major surprise as the judges deliver unexpected news about the days competition.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its judgement day as the chefs not only learn the top three desserts but the judges announce the winning menu. Fast show writer and performer Charlie Higson helps judge the puddings.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the climax of the competition as the winning chefs cook at the Comic Relief Banquet at the Royal Albert Hall. But its not plain sailing - the chefs have to contend with getting into the kitchen late.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today three of Scotlands top chefs, Jak ODonnell, Jimmy Lee, and Graham Campbell attempt to impress this weeks veteran judge. Returning finalist Jak is determined to make it to the banquet, but newcomers Jimmy and Graham are out to steal her crown.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today Scottish chefs, Jak ODonnell, Jimmy Lee and Graham Campbell fight it out for the fish course. Graham is in a confident mood but returning finalist Jak and Jimmy are pushing him hard. Will the pressure prove too much for ambitious Graham?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today Scottish chefs Jak ODonnell, Jimmy Lee and Graham Campbell are battling to plate up a perfect main course for this weeks veteran chef. Self-taught Jimmy is honouring his Mum with his rendition of her Chinese Beef Stew.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today its the Scottish chefs last chance to impress, with the dessert course. Only two can cook for the judges tomorrow, and with one chef in the lead after a triumphant main, the pressures on for the other two to plate up perfection.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Scottish chefs cook their entire menus again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort. Theyre joined by WI Calendar Girl Angela Baker, who will help decide which chef will go forward to the National Finals.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today three of the South Wests finest chefs - Jude Kereama, Josh Eggleton and Dominic Chapman - attempt to impress this weeks veteran judge with their starters.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the three South West chefs - Jude Kereama, Josh Eggleton and Dominic Chapman fight it out for the fish course. Despite school-boy errors yesterday, experienced Dominic is determined to get a high score today.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today its a battle for the main course with the three South West chefs - Jude Kereama, Josh Eggleton and Dominic Chapman going head to head.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today its the last chance for the South Wests chefs to impress, with the dessert course. Only two chefs can go through to cook for the judges so with everything to play for, who will plate up perfection and who will be sent packing?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining South West chefs cook their entire menus again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort. Joining the judges is Radhika Bynon, a member of the Forest Gate, Womens Institute, a modern urban group of women.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today representing Wales Stephen Gomes, Adam Bannister and Phil Carmichael are challenged to plate up perfect starter courses for this weeks veteran judge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the three Welsh chefs - Stephen Gomes, Adam Bannister and Phil Carmichael fight it out for the fish course. Experimental chef Stephen is determined to prove himself with a fish course honouring the WIs tradition of preserving.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its a battle for the main course with the Welsh chefs - Stephen Gomes, Adam Bannister and Phil Carmichael are going head to head. With all 3 chefs paying homage to Welsh lamb; the pressure is on to deliver a main worthy of their veterans approval.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today its the tricky dessert course, and the last chance for the Welsh chefs to secure their place in tomorrows regional final. Only two can make it through, and one will leave the competition for good.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Welsh chefs cook their four courses again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort along with guest judge and long serving WI member Rosemary Bishton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three of Northern Irelands top chefs Chris McGowan, Danni Barry and Ben Arnold go head to head with their starter courses to impress this weeks veteran judge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today three of Northern Irelands top chefs Chris McGowan, Danni Barry and Ben Arnold are cooking their fish courses. Ambitious Ben is determined to steal Chriss regional crown.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Central Region chefs cook their entire menus again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort.

programme.title: And Now... Make Your Peace with God
programme.desc: Two men ride toward Denver City, each chasing a ghost from the past—one seeks his father’s killer, the other a treacherous friend who stole his gold. Along the way, a silent, deadly gunslinger joins them, his motives unknown. In the shadows of vengeance, alliances shift and secrets unravel.

programme.title: The Great Jesse James Raid
programme.desc: Retired outlaw Jesse James, under an alias, reluctantly joins Bob Ford for a Colorado gold raid. Assembling a crew, including a demolition expert and a getaway driver, they meet at Fords saloon. Betrayals and bloodshed follow, with Ford plotting against Jesse for a reward. The drama peaks as lives are lost and the two ride off in separate directions.

programme.title: Against a Crooked Sky
programme.desc: The eldest daughter of a pioneer family is kidnapped by a mysterious Indian tribe and the eldest son pursues. In order to win back his sisters freedom, he must sacrifice his own life by passing the test of "Crooked Sky" and shield his sister from an executioners arrow. Along the way, he recruits a broken down, drunk prospector to help him track down the unknown tribe and rescue his sister.

programme.title: Lightning Jack
programme.desc: Lightning Jack Kane is an Australian outlaw in the wild west. During a bungled bank robbery he picks up mute Ben Doyle as a hostage. The two become good friends, with Jack teaching Ben how to rob banks, while they plan Jacks last heist.

programme.title: Tequila aka Fuzzy the Hero
programme.desc: Tequila and Bobo hit the little town of Chedron intending to rob the local bank whose owner, De Koven, is trying to freeze out all the ranchers in the area by the simple expedient of foreclosing on the mortgages his bank holds on their land.

programme.title: Pray to God and Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: Fernando returns from exile in Texas seeking revenge for his siblings deaths. But instead of personal vengeance, he’s driven to spark a revolution against the oppressive landowners, transforming his mission into a fight for justice and freedom.

programme.title: Shotgun
programme.desc: Deputy U.S. Marshal Clay Hardin plans to retire and take a commissioner role, but when the notorious Ben Thompson kills a fellow marshal, Clay abandons his new path—and his girl—to hunt the gang. Joined by a bounty hunter and a captivating half-breed woman, he ventures into Apache land, uncovering a deadly plot to arm the tribes with repeating rifles.

programme.title: War Paint
programme.desc: Lieut. Billings and his patrol must deliver a peace treaty to Chief Gray Cloud in nine days to prevent war. Guided by the chief’s son, Taslik, they face dwindling water and rising tensions. As suspicions grow, they notice Taslik wearing war paint. Is he leading them to peace or into a trap?

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E01-04
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: The Black Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Two black bounty hunters arrive in a small western town on the trail of an outlaw. Finding the town without a sheriff, they take charge, much to the displeasure of the mostly white townsfolk. As they chase women, demand money, and stir up trouble, they wait for the right moment to capture their prey, raising tensions along the way.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger (Klinton Spilsbury) of an ambush arranged by outlaw leader Major Bartholomew "Butch" Cavendish (Christopher Lloyd) returns to fight back as a great masked western hero, The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: My Name is Pecos
programme.desc: Everyone wants to know who the Mexican is. He always answer slowly, "my name is Pecos". Pecos Martinez to be exact, and hes returned to his hometown of Houston to settle up with Clain, the leader of a gang of cut-throats. Clain is busy looking for the money from a recent robbery thats been stolen from him. Soon the stolen cash in Pecos vengeance entwine and all hell breaks loose. Behind the scenes a Bible touting Undertaker (Umberto Raho), a cowardly saloon owner, and a helpful saloon girl become part of the story. This film made Woods as internationally known as Pecos in the third world countries as Franco Nero was known for Django. A Mexican hero against a gang and a town full of...

programme.title: South of the Rio Grande
programme.desc: When Miguel Sanchez uses stolen cattle and false accusations to have innocents killed, Cisco steps in. After rescuing a wagon under attack, Cisco discovers the victim was meant to replace Sanchez. Disguising himself as the victim, Cisco infiltrates Sanchezs operation to uncover evidence and bring justice to the rancho.

programme.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
programme.desc: The Winchester Does Not Forgive - When the stagecoach in which they travel is attacked by Monteiros gang, Lash accepts to kill his friend to save his bacon.

programme.title: White Fang and the Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Sandy Shaw inherits the "Eagles Nest" gold mine in Canadas wild north. With his son Rick and dog Whiskey, he faces Taft, a ruthless rival eager to claim the mine. When Sandy’s proxy bride arrives, the clash of greed, revenge, and betrayal turns deadly in this fight for survival.

programme.title: Death on High Mountain
programme.desc: A major robbery spirals out of control when two young men cross paths with ruthless Mexican bandits and a corrupt businessman—both desperate to reclaim the stolen loot. Caught in a deadly chase, the youths face danger, betrayal, and the fight for survival.

programme.title: The Return of Jack Slade
programme.desc: Jack Slade, son of a legendary lawman, infiltrates a ruthless gang of outlaws to bring them down from within. After his friend is killed, Slade sets a deadly trap with the help of a Pinkerton agent. Deception, betrayal, and revenge ride hard in this classic Western showdown.

programme.title: In a Colts Shadow
programme.desc: A story about two gunfighters, Duke and Steve. Steve is in love with Dukes daughter but Duke disapproves of the match, envisioning a life of hardship and danger for the girl if she marries Steve.

programme.title: Reverends Colt
programme.desc: Reverend Miller arrives in Tucson where he wants to build a church, but on the very day of his arrival a gang raids the bank and the people of Tucson, suspicious of the new reverend because he is carrying a gun, immediately blame him for the robbery.

programme.title: Troublemakers
programme.desc: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

programme.title: Return of Sabata
programme.desc: Hobsonvilles citizens hire a gunslinger to rid them of the McIntock clan that is forcibly and unlawfully taxing the townsfolk under the pretext of town development.

programme.title: Colt in the Hand of the Devil
programme.desc: Scotty is hired to eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits led by El Condor. He cleverly earns their trust to trap them—but as he bonds with El Condor, a true friendship and mutual respect begin to challenge his mission.

programme.title: Hate your Neighbour
programme.desc: Ken wants justice for his brother Bill, who was killed by a notorious gunman named Stevens for a goldmine map. The gunman is arguing with gangster Malone (Horst Frank) about the map. A deadly cat and mouse game between the three men ensues.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP36-38
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Deadly Trackers
programme.desc: Jeff sets out to murder each one of the five outlaws who robbed, raped and killed his poor sister.

programme.title: The Over-the-Hill Gang Rides Again
programme.desc: Retired Texas Ranger Nash Crawford re-assembles his former Ranger outfit from the old days to fight crime in his hometown.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bandit
programme.desc: In Old California, a Frenchman carrying silver is ambushed by Cisco, a bandit claiming the money belongs to the poor. When the "Frenchman" is revealed to be Jeanne DuBois, she follows Cisco to his lair. As romance blooms, Cisco offers to return the silver to her. Jeanne must now choose between her deal and aiding Ciscos quest to help the needy.

programme.title: Running Target
programme.desc: In the Colorado Rockies, Sheriff Scott, heads a posse that is after four escaped convicts, and thought it is his sworn duty to return the men dead or alive, he is, as always, reluctant to kill his fellow man.

programme.title: China 9, Liberty 37
programme.desc: The railroad hires a condemned killer to murder an uncooperative rancher but the assassin fails to deliver, prompting the railroad men to go after him instead.

programme.title: Bandidos
programme.desc: Renowned gunman Richard Martin is traveling on a train, held up by Billy Kane, a former student of Martins. Kane spares Martin, but only after shooting his hands. Years later, Martin meets an escaped convict, wrongly convicted for the train robbery. Martin trains his new student and both men seek out Billy Kane.

programme.title: Three Graves for a Winchester
programme.desc: Ringo Carson has a tough life. First, he has a falling out with his best friend, Frank Sanders, after saving Jane, the girl he loves, from Mexican kidnappers in order to extort a ransom from her gunrunner father.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A quiet border town erupts into chaos as tensions rise between the US and Mexico. The cause? A ruthless Mexican bandit determined to kill as many US soldiers as possible. As political turmoil intensifies, the town becomes the center of a deadly conflict, where vengeance, power, and survival collide.

programme.title: LIVEFEED
programme.desc: A raw and intimate experience featuring the kitchen staff of the high-end restaurant Le Poisson Bleu

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Cantonese cuisine often incorporates pork and host Mary Tang shows us three diverse ways to elevate this juicy protein. First, she chops up a sweet winter melon - saving the hollowed out shell to use as a bowl - with spicy shredded scallops and lean pork tenderloin. Then, she whips up a quick and easy pork stir-fry with crispy snow peas and delicious red peppers. Finally, Mary showcases a Cantonese take on barbeque pork. The secret? A mind-blowing marinade. With sugar and honey crusted pork butt, fermented bean curd and a mixture of deli- cious Asian sauces, this tangy dish is worthy of an extra batch. Dont forget, delicately steamed sweet buns take this dish up a notch - Mary offers a...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Theres nothing more authentic than street food - Vietnamese style! Host Lisa Nguyen shares her tips and tricks on tasty Lemongrass-infused Beef Wraps. A vast array of ingredients including peppery betel leaves, gorgeous greens and crunchy peanuts complement the tenderness of flavoursome, marinated ground beef. Lisas next dish is an iconic Vietnamese street food - crispy Sizzling Crepes with juicy pork belly and earthy vegetables will definitely activate your taste buds. For dessert, Lisa whips up a batch of sweet coconut pudding using beautiful bananas and velvety coconut milk sprinkled with roasted sesame seeds for some crunch.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: The Lebanese love their stuffed foods, and host Jasmin Ibrahim shows us just how to do it! To start, she eloquently crafts golden Spinach and Feta Turnovers. Then, she stuffs a delicious zucchini with tender beef, crunchy nuts, and soft basmati rice, and smothers it in a flavourful tomato sauce. Next up, Stuffed Lamb and Bulgur Balls - small torpedo shaped balls of juicy minced meat, light and nutty bulgur, and a medley of aromatic spices. Her final dish? A date-stuffed cookie called Maamoul. Normally made for special occasions, these sweet cookies burst with flavour.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Olives: The Most Useful Ingredient
programme.desc: Is there anything more Greek than olives? Host Joanna Chery shows us how versatile the olive really is by cooking up four diverse Greek dishes. To start, a rich, baked-to-perfection Olive Bread loaded with strong, slightly fruity black Kalamata olives. She then prepares a refreshing Greek Village Salad full of seasonal vegetables, creamy feta, and plump juicy olives tossed in extra virgin olive oil. And guess what? It pairs great with fried Olive Bread! Then, Joanna switches it up with wonderful green olives - the star in her delicious stuffing for Apricot and Feta-Stuffed Chicken Thighs. Finally, were graced with a unique dessert - Saint Fanourios Cake. Joanna adds metaxa (Greek...

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Scotland, France, USA, Myanmar
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo creates veggie dishes inspired by Scotland, France, the USA, and Myanmar!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Ever crave a delicious Indian feast? Host Vijaya Selvaraju cooks up Indian classics for a delightful family meal.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Papaya Salad, Carrot Hog Dogs, Squid, and Tofu
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, green papaya salad with crispy pork! Next, BBQ carrot hot dogs! Followed by grilled squid steak! Finishing with Korean BBQ tofu!

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Say hello to yellow with chef Pino Di Cerbo as he brightens each dish with glowing, golden-hued produce! Corn on the cob gets a fun presentation as ribs, chopped into spears, spiked with harissa spices, and grilled until smoky. Next is a sweet and sour detour with mangoes and lemons in a no-bake cheesecake with a unique popped amaranth crust. Next, aromatic and hearty Kerala-style curry includes all things gold and beautiful: creamy yellow potatoes, sweet yellow peppers, even snappy yellow beans! Finally, stick around for a Thai-inspired noodle salad, where even the noodles are veggies! Strands of mildly sweet spaghetti squash paired with nutty cashews, tender sprouts and a punchy...

programme.title: Pressures On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Hearty Weeknight Multi-Cooker Dishes
programme.desc: Do you know the secret to an uncracked cheesecake? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shares her trick to making a perfectly silky-smooth Salted Caramel Cheesecake.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Host Poppy Sandler kicks off Up the Dish with her version of moms spaghetti - a scrumptious Spaghetti Pomodoro that takes it to the top! Next up to the plate is Missy Hui, who hits it out of the park with her heavenly Bun Viet, a sweet and sour vermicelli noodle bowl and citrusy lemongrass grilled pork combo. Then, Tiera Singh takes up the challenge with her vegetarian Miso Ramen - an umami flavour bomb of miso, mirin, and even more noodle goodness. But theres nowhere to go but up with Micahs Lobster Cantonese Chow Mein, an elegantly upscaled rendition of Chinese noodles with bright ginger, tender gai lan, and crisp chow mein, all coated in an exquisite black bean sauce.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when its grilled to perfection

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: What better way to feel good than delightful Cantonese comfort food? Talented home cook Mary Tang give us the lowdown on how to make crunchy, flavoursome Shrimp Toast. To spice it up, she boils a simmering hot pot of a traditional Cantonese soup - Congee. Normally eaten at breakfast, this delicious silky rice soup is loaded with succulent ground pork, earthy shiitake mushrooms, and aromatic ginger and scallions. Next, Mary swears that White Cut Chicken is the ultimate Cantonese comfort food. Slow-poached in juicy chicken stock paired with fresh broccoli and topped with fiery gingERS-scallion oil, this dish adds a little extra warmth to your life. For dessert, Mary whips up a batch of...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Say goodbye to dirty cutlery in this One World Kitchen 3 episode featuring Vietnamese finger foods! Talented cook Lisa Nguyen starts off by making delicious Pork Skewer Rolls - perfect for any party! Featuring tender pork, crispy lettuce, fresh mint, crunchy cucumber, and Chinese chives wrapped in soft rice paper, this dish pairs well with a nuoc cham dipping sauce. Sticky Lemongrass Spare Ribs are next up to the plate; steamed and marinated in a garlicy, caramel glaze (yum!). Next, Lisa fries up some tasty Shrimp and Sweet Potato Fritters using a foolproof technique, adding nuoc cham dipping sauce and lovely Bibb lettuce on the side. Finally, fingERS-licking Vietnamese Coffee Cupcakes...

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Host Poppy Sandler kicks off Up the Dish with her version of moms spaghetti - a scrumptious Spaghetti Pomodoro that takes it to the top! Next up to the plate is Missy Hui, who hits it out of the park with her heavenly Bun Viet, a sweet and sour vermicelli noodle bowl and citrusy lemongrass grilled pork combo. Then, Tiera Singh takes up the challenge with her vegetarian Miso Ramen - an umami flavour bomb of miso, mirin, and even more noodle goodness. But theres nowhere to go but up with Micahs Lobster Cantonese Chow Mein, an elegantly upscaled rendition of Chinese noodles with bright ginger, tender gai lan, and crisp chow mein, all coated in an exquisite black bean sauce.

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Say hello to yellow with chef Pino Di Cerbo as he brightens each dish with glowing, golden-hued produce! Corn on the cob gets a fun presentation as ribs, chopped into spears, spiked with harissa spices, and grilled until smoky. Next is a sweet and sour detour with mangoes and lemons in a no-bake cheesecake with a unique popped amaranth crust. Next, aromatic and hearty Kerala-style curry includes all things gold and beautiful: creamy yellow potatoes, sweet yellow peppers, even snappy yellow beans! Finally, stick around for a Thai-inspired noodle salad, where even the noodles are veggies! Strands of mildly sweet spaghetti squash paired with nutty cashews, tender sprouts and a punchy...

He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: Michael Faraday on katkera FBI:n agenttina toimineen vaimonsa kuolemasta. Han asuu poikansa Grantin kanssa rauhallisella esikaaupunkialueella, jossa he tutustuvat miellyttaviin naapureihinsa Oliver ja Cheryl Langiin. Ystavyyden syventyessa Michael alkaa epailemaan naapureidensa todellista taustaa ja uskoo loytaneensa yhteyksia terrorismiin.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

Kirjailija luuli kirjoittavansa tulevaisuudesta, mutta kirjoittikin menneisyydesta. Hanen romaanissaan juna ajaa silloin talloin vuoteen 2046. Jokaisella matkustajalla oli sama aikomus: elaa kadotetut muistonsa uudestaan. Sanottiin, etta vuonna 2046 mikaan ei ollut muuttunut. Kukaan ei tarkkaan tiennyt, oliko se totta, koska matkustajat eivat koskaan palanneet - paitsi yksi. Han oli siella mutta halusi lahtea pois.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: George on epatoivoinen mies. Hanen terveytensa horjuu ja hanella ei ole mitaan minka puoleen kaantya, ja pian han loytaa itsensa New York Cityn anteeksiantamattomilta kaduilta. Kaytettyaan loppuun kaikki valiaikaisen majoituksen vaihtoehdot han hakee turvapaikkaa Bellevuen sairaalasta, Mahattanin suurimmasta kodittomien miesten vastaanottokeskuksesta. Sekin osoittautuu raaaksi ja vaikeakulkuiseksi ymparistoksi taynna samalla tavalla syrjaytyneita sieluja. Mutta Georgen ystavystyttya kokeneeseen yomaja-asukkiin Dixoniin han alkaa kypsytella mielessaan toivoa siita, etta saisi korjattua suhteen tyttareensa, josta on vieraantunut.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: JFK - Avoin tapaus
programme.desc: New Orleansin piirisyyttaja Jim Garrison ottaa tehtavakseen tutkia presidentti John F. Kennedyn murhaa Dallasissa, Texasissa vuonna 1963. Se, mita han saa selville, saa hanet epailemaan, etta tarinassa on muutakin kuin julkisuuden versio.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember
programme.desc: Paha poika Landon valitaan koulunaytelmaan lukutoukka Jamien vastanayttelijaksi. Heidan valilleen puhkeaa romanssi, mutta tragedia uhkaa repia heidat erilleen.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Tulevaisuudessa, jossa aika on kirjaimellisesti rahaa ja ikaantyminen pysahtyy 25 vuoteen, ainoa tapa pysya hengissa on ansaita, varastaa tai peria enemman aikaa. Will Salas elaa minuutti kerrallaan, kunnes yllatysvoitto aikaa antaa hanelle paasyn varakkaiden maailmaan, jossa han ryhtyy yhteistyohon kauniin nuoren perijattaren kanssa tuhotakseen korruptoituneen jarjestelman.

programme.title: Childs Play (2019)
programme.desc: ”SE”-elokuvan tuottajien CHILD’S PLAY on taysin uusi versio pahasta Chucky-nukesta kertovasta kauhuklassikosta. Chuckyn aanena kuullaan Mark Hamill. Kun Karen ostaa huippukehittyneen Buddi-nuken syntymapaivalahjaksi pojalleen Andylle, han kutsuu tietamattaan pahuuden kotiinsa. Andyn taytyy saada aikuiset kuuntelemaan, jotta nukke saadaan pysaytettya ennen kuin on liian myohaista.

programme.title: Bad samaritan
programme.desc: Sean ja Derek ovat pikkurikollisia, joiden erikoisuutena on pyrkia toihin ravintoloiden parkkipaikoille tarkoituksenaan tyhjentaa rikkaiden vieraiden koti naiden poissa ollessa. Murtautuessaan varakkaan Cale Erendreichin kotiin Sean loytaa salaoven, jonka tiirikoi auki.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: Isa ja tytar nousevat nopeaan KTX-junaan, jonka pitaisi vieda heidat Soulista Busaniin. Mutta matkan varrella alkaa maailmanloppu, ja suurin osa ihmisista muuttuu lihansyoja-zombeiksi.

programme.title: This is England
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu 1980-luvun Englantiin, jossa Falklandin sotaan lahetetaan jatkuvasti lisaa sotilaita ja kansallismieliset saavat jalansijaa tyovaenluokkaisten tyottomien keskuudessa. Skan ja Oi-punkin kannattajat jakautuvat musiikin ystaviin ja skineihin. Taman kaiken keskella 12-vuotias Shaun loytaa skinijengin kanssa yhteisen savelen.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: Bettyn veli tuomitaan murhasta, jolloin alkaa 18 vuoden taistelu jarjestelmaa vastaan. Betty uskoo veljensa syyttomyyteen, joten han alkaa opiskella oikeustiedetta voidakseen puolustaa veljeaan oikeudessa!

programme.title: Irma Vep
programme.desc: Rene Vidal, ylistettu ja rakastettu elokuvaohjaaja, on joutunut rappiolle floppielokuvien seurauksena. Uusi projekti on Les vampires -klassikon uudelleenfilmatisointi, jonka paarooliin han on valinnut hongkongilaistahti Maggie Cheungin, mutta kuvauksissa mikaan ei suju Vidalin eika Cheungin suunnitelmien mukaan. Irma Vep on palkitun ohjaaja Olivier Assayasin (Personal Shopper, Clouds of Sils Maria) lapimurtoelokuva, jossa Jean-Pierre Leaud (Les quatre cents coups, Le Havre) esittaa ohjaaja Rene Vidalia ja Maggie Cheung (In the Mood for Love, Hero) kuvitteellista versiota itsestaan.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: Youre Not You
programme.desc: Kaksinkertainen Oscar-voittaja Hillary Swank on menestynyt konserttipianisti Kate, jossa todetaan parantumaton sairaus ALS. Hanen perheensa jarjestaa hanelle parasta mahdollista hoitoa, mutta Kate itse antautuu taysin epapatevan Becin hoiviin. Hoitoon sisaltyy yhta lailla naurua kuin kyyneleitakin, ja nama kaksi taysin erilaista naista loytavat toistensa suurimmat vahvuudet.

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Ryyppyjuhlista ja putkareissuista uudestisyntyneeksi kristityksi. Texasin oljykenttien mustasta kullasta Washingtonin Valkoiseen taloon. Isan varjosta sotaan vihollisen lin-jojen takana Irakissa. Tama on Yhdysvaltain 43. presidentin uskomaton tarina. Vihasitpa tai rakastitpa hanta - tai rakastitpa vihata hanta - George W. Bush on kiis-tatta historian kiistellyin ja puhutuin yhdysvaltalainen presidentti. Oscar®-voittaja Oliver Stone tarkastelee elokuvassaan W:ta lempeasti ja piirtaa yllattavan sympaatti-sen kuvan maalaispojasta, josta - lahinna onnettoman sattuman kautta - tuli maail-man mahtavin mies.

programme.title: Mark Of A Murderer
programme.desc: "Mark of a Murderer" on tositarina NYPD-etsiva Vincent Lamarasta, joka on brutaalin murhaajan kintereilla. Epaillyn tavoittaessaan etsivakonkari rukoilee kerrankin erehtyneensa: poliisin haaviin on jaanyt Joey Lamara, Vincentin oma poika!

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde
programme.desc: Sodan erottamat Tristan ja Isolde joutuvat pitamaan tunteensa kurissa rauhan ja Englannin tulevaisuuden takia. Mutta mita enemman he kieltavat tunteensa, sita vahvempina ne vellovat....

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.
