programme.desc: Deep dive into the season of Dropped as the Brothers recap an epic 30 Day adventure through the Canadian Bush

programme.title: To Be Alive
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Dropped S4 - "To Be Alive"
programme.desc: Chris and Casey select a duo to join them in Alaska after reviewing video submissions. At the airport, Casey and Kaid embark on their adventure, while Chris and his team face delays at the hangar.

programme.title: Up with the Gods
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Up with the Gods"
programme.desc: Mario teams up with good friend and precision rifle expert Bernard and heads into the high alpine mountains above New Zealand’s rugged West Coast in search of tahr. Drawing on his Greek roots, Mario cooks a rustic “Kleftiko” dish in an earth oven.

programme.title: Outback Odyssey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Outback Odyssey"
programme.desc: Mario Kalpou travels to the outback desert of Australia in search of feral camels that have been running rampant. With a bow in hand and scorching heat he explores the Great Dividing Range, hoping to harvest one of these middle eastern based beasts.

programme.title: Rising Tides
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Rising Tides"
programme.desc: Off the coast of Belize, the group of anglers continue their pursuit of bonefish and tarpon. Michael Keaton and Zach Gilford chase tarpon, while Bill Klyn and Yvon Chouinard are after bone. We also share a boat with Aaron Adams and Tom McGuane.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Fighting Fish"
programme.desc: Angling experts Lori-Ann Murphy and Aaron Adams prove that catching a tarpon is no easy feat as they try to land a silver king in the Florida Keys. Dr. Jerry Ault discusses the research underway as scientists try to unravel the mysteries of these fish.

programme.title: Day One Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day One Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Day one begins as the four 2-man teams blast off from Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West with nine different cameras rolling on all the action including helicopter and underwater cameras.

programme.title: Day One Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day One Pt. 2"
programme.desc: Day one continues as the four teams search for huge hungry sharks in the beautiful waters of the coast of Key West, Florida.

programme.title: Three Kings Redemption
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Three Kings Redemption"
programme.desc: After a break of dawn beach launch off the tip of 90 Mile Beach, the team punch north to the legendary Three Kings Islands, home to dozens of record calibre fish, and in the process, bag a couple of new records for themselves.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 South Seas Spearo S2 - "The Rock"
programme.desc: The Spearo team are in the deep South this week, departing Bluff for a couple of days diving the pristine waters of Stewart Island, but will the brief weather window allow them to make the notorious steam all the way to remote Solander Island?

programme.title: Fast and Famous
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Fast and Famous S1 - "Fast and Famous"
programme.desc: Racing Driver Arie Luyendyk Jr. challenges two celebrities, kickboxer Rico Verhoeven and footballer Sol Campbell, to see who is the fastest around the track.

programme.title: Volvo P1800
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Volvo P1800"
programme.desc: Mat Watson hunts throughout Europe for a classy Nordic coupe. The Volvo P1800.

programme.title: Fiat 500
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Fiat 500"
programme.desc: Mat Watson is asked to track down a Fiat 500 for a client with a tiny garage, but finding a good example of this little motor proves a massive challenge.

programme.title: Porsche 911
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Porsche 911"
programme.desc: Mat Watson crosses Europe in search of the ultimate seventies sports car, as he hunts down the iconic Porsche 911.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Anthony strives to prove himself as medical lead responding to a snowmobile crash on Togwotee Pass.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: The first priority of every mission is team safety, so when conditions on Pyramid Peak threaten Jake and Cody during a rescue, Tim demands they pump the breaks.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Silencing Terry
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "Silencing Terry"
programme.desc: Terry wants to demonstrate how Hollywood has used different objects to silence a gunshot, and he and Larry will take to the range to see which one is the most qualified to act as a silencer. Terry also has a sit-down with Joey Zasa from Godfather 3 (Joe Mantegna) to discuss what he thinks of Hollywood’s adaptation of the silencer.

programme.title: Waterfalls Lodge (Algoma)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E03 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Waterfalls Lodge (Algoma)"
programme.desc: Jenna McKeown is on the hunt for big smallmouth bass on topwater flies in Northern Ontario. She is in luck as a major dragonfly hatch is about to happen.

programme.title: Flowers River Lodge (Labrador)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E04 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Flowers River Lodge (Labrador)"
programme.desc: Labrador is renowned for big Brook Trout but also Atlantic Salmon. Host Colin McKeown visits one of the top salmon lodges in the world.

programme.title: Romania
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Romania"
programme.desc: A meeting with a woman who secretly transcribed 3,000 Hollywood films while under an oppressive regime inspires Jonathan to make his own movie. So with a small budget and a cast of local actors he scouts Saxon castles, Danube tributaries, and ruined buildings to direct an action adventure flick.

programme.title: Surviving Nature’s Fury – Storms
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Nature’s Fury – Storms"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura experience Nature’s fury through storm amazing generating gear that simulates terrible hurricanes, ice cold winds and even tornados. For these experiments they’ll use remarkable technology that creates massive storms on Hollywood sets.

programme.title: Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack"
programme.desc: Laura and Nick explore the techniques to deal with these apex predators when they are the most dangerous. We’ll scientifically breakdown the behaviors, strength, eyesight and speed of mountain lions through outrageous experiments, in day and night.

programme.title: LOST!
programme.desc: Nick and Laura head deep into the mountains to explore survival techniques that go far beyond anything they’ve learned before. Our courageous hosts subject themselves to intense survival training with the Survival Training School of California.

programme.title: Ruhr District
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Epic Exploring S2 - "Ruhr District"
programme.desc: Exploring in the industrial Ruhr District in Germany, Josh discovers abandoned steel and mining factories and experiences a miner’s life underneath the ground.

programme.title: Isle of Wight
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Epic Exploring S2 - "Isle of Wight"
programme.desc: Cody experiences the ‘Island life’ on the Isle of Wight, England, a heaven for urban exploring including a medieval lighthouse and a derelict holiday resort.

programme.title: Charleroi
programme.desc: Local exploring in industrial Charleroi, brings Cody to abandoned factories and an unknown spot full of colorful graffiti. An old casino awaits to be explored.

programme.title: Trapped In A Glacier
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Fight to Survive S2 - "Trapped In A Glacier"
programme.desc: While hiking alone deep in Glacier National Park, Ted Porter plummets into an icy glacial crevasse. With a broken back and miles from anyone, he must fight to survive.

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1"
programme.desc: Hunters Adrian Knopps and Garrett Hagen venture into the remotest part of Alaska’s Misty Fjord, hunting Moose and Bear. After a successful hunt Adrian finds himself trapped by a twenty foot tidal surge after Garrett fails to return with the skiff.

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2"
programme.desc: After a successful hunt, Adrian Knopps’ hunting partner disappears taking their bear out to the boat. Now Adrian finds himself stranded on a tidal flat surround by bears and wolf packs and with massive storm bearing down on him. How will he survive?

programme.title: Bali
programme.desc: We travel to Bali - Indonesia to meet an MTB pro rider who decided to start a new life dividing his time between surfing and riding active volcanos.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 MTB Heroes S3 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: We meet one of the most famous MTB photographers in New Zealand and follow him during the biggest MTB competition in Rotorua.

programme.title: Paris
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Running the World S1 - "Paris"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to France where they are challenged to create a run in historic Lisses.

programme.title: Ready to race
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "Ready to race"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel team heads back to the 2 mile long runway at Elvington, where last year Jon Webster crashed the car. He drives it in anger for the first time since that fateful day but have they done enough?

programme.title: Waterfalls Lodge (Algoma)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E03 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Waterfalls Lodge (Algoma)"
programme.desc: Jenna McKeown is on the hunt for big smallmouth bass on topwater flies in Northern Ontario. She is in luck as a major dragonfly hatch is about to happen.

programme.title: Flowers River Lodge (Labrador)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E04 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Flowers River Lodge (Labrador)"
programme.desc: Labrador is renowned for big Brook Trout but also Atlantic Salmon. Host Colin McKeown visits one of the top salmon lodges in the world.

programme.title: Romania
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Road Less Traveled S3 - "Romania"
programme.desc: A meeting with a woman who secretly transcribed 3,000 Hollywood films while under an oppressive regime inspires Jonathan to make his own movie. So with a small budget and a cast of local actors he scouts Saxon castles, Danube tributaries, and ruined buildings to direct an action adventure flick.

programme.title: Day 3
programme.desc: Kevin leaves civilization behind in Suriname, while thousands of kilometers away, Jalou has to go literally through the trees in an Australian forest.

programme.title: Day 4
programme.desc: Jalou and Kevin travel to far colder places to challenge each other in an ice climbing competition.

programme.title: Day 5
programme.desc: In the Chinese desert, Kevin finds out that desert racing is difficult. While in Bolivia, Jalou wants to prove to her brother that women can be better drivers.

programme.title: Hot Mess
programme.desc: Wardens gear up for the last week of the season. The pressure is on, putting the Wardens right in the middle of a Hot Mess.

programme.title: The Philippines
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Travel Bug S1 - "The Philippines"
programme.desc: The Philippines is a beautiful nation. The archipelago contains countless islands, sandy beaches and smiling faces. Best of all it is a destination where one day you can relax in a luxury resort, then the next you can get dirty in a street market.

programme.title: New South Wales, Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Travel Bug S1 - "New South Wales, Australia"
programme.desc: Starting in Sydney, we travel over the Harbour Bridge and dine with koalas, before heading into the Blue Mountains and out to the far west to the ancient landscape of Mungo National Park. This desert landscape has a fascinating story.

programme.title: Divide and Conquer
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Divide and Conquer"
programme.desc: Chris needs to make this happen. With willows to high to attempt a shot from the current location, Chris frantically pushes and closes the distance to 300 yards.

programme.title: Weathered and Worn
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Weathered and Worn"
programme.desc: The brothers devise a plan and advance toward the bull. Mid-stalk, the bull rises and approaches them, turning away just before Casey can line up the scope behind its shoulder.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Trail S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 say goodbye to their final camp and head home.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: Alaskan weather clears for Chris and Kaid to hunt food, while Casey and R.L. set up camp before moose season. Its their first time being Dropped separately, requiring adjustment.

programme.title: Predators Prowl
programme.desc: Chris and Kaid ready their rafts while Casey and R.L. begin searching for black bears and moose. Chris and Kaid spot a predator heading toward camp.

programme.title: Volcanic Kingfish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Volcanic Kingfish"
programme.desc: Mario hooks up with old friend and current world record holder for kingfish Rick Pollock. They fish the coast of New Zealand just off a live Volcano, then tragedy strikes. After the Volcano erupts Mario prepares an amazing ceviche dish.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Meet Island Air
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Meet Island Air"
programme.desc: Veteran bush pilot Bob Stanford risks everything to save hunters struggling to stay alive in a remote area of Kodiak.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Fight or Flight"
programme.desc: While on a routine sightseeing flight, a massive storm has the pilots fighting to keep control of the craft and keep their passengers safe.

programme.title: Deadmans Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Deadmans Survival"
programme.desc: Island Air battles time and elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: The Broads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hunting Fish S1 - "The Broads"
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt the mighty Pike in the Uk’s Norfolk Broads.

programme.title: Extremadura
programme.desc: Thom hunt is challenged to hunt a record-breaking Barbel in the Spain’s striking Extremadura.

programme.title: UK
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate and catch four UK species in one week.

programme.title: Tippets and Leaders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Tippets and Leaders"
programme.desc: The teams goal of landing and tagging a mature tarpon is fulfilled, as one of the anglers lands a 60lbs silver king. Michael Keaton and Yvon Choulnard spend time wading throught the flats together and we look back on the week spend in Belize.

programme.title: Day Two Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Day two of the Madfin Shark Series begins, as its becoming clearer which of our four 2-man teams will have to do whatever it takes to not be in last place and being eliminated. Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West sees the sharks finding captains idle.

programme.title: Day Two Pt.2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Two Pt.2"
programme.desc: Day two and the battle continues on the Madfin Shark Series. Four of our 2-man teams are catching and releasing the biggest and most dangerous sharks they can for the most points they can accrue. After today, one team will be sent home and eliminated.

programme.title: Day Three Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Its the third and final day of competition for the remaining 3 teams in this intense shark tournament. See how the first half of the day turns out.

programme.title: Far North Bluewater Mission
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Far North Bluewater Mission"
programme.desc: 60 nautical miles + 200kg of Burley divided by 3 keen spearos = mayhem. The team go wide this week, overnighting aboard The Orca in 1000m of water in the Far North, in an attempt to create a 24-hour trail capable of attracting in who knows what!

programme.title: Hardcore Hapuka
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Hardcore Hapuka"
programme.desc: We return to Fiordland in the hope of going one step better in slotting a hapuka on a spear, but the presence of Bluefin Tuna off the coast, and Wapiti Bulls on the slip faces proves a tempting distraction from the task at hand!

programme.title: Pitt Island Expedition
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Pitt Island Expedition"
programme.desc: Following a ridiculous sequence of events in Fiordland, the team saddle up and head for the hapuka haven of the Chatham Islands, where they spend a few days diving the spectacular and remote Pitt Island.

programme.title: ATV Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Survival Science S1 - "ATV Accidents"
programme.desc: ATVs have allowed us to penetrate the wilderness like never before. But they’ve also made the backcountry a bit more dangerous. Laura and Nick rig up some dramatic, high-speed tests to see how accidents happen and what you can do to protect yourself.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: The team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: The Journal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Fight to Survive S2 - "The Journal"
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming, when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11 day fight to survive in his own journal.

programme.title: Tree Stand Fall
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Fight to Survive S2 - "Tree Stand Fall"
programme.desc: Deer hunter Nathan Holcomb plummets from his tree stand. Every hunters’ worst nightmare becomes Nathan’s reality. With a broken back paralyzing him, Nathan must crawl out on his own to find help.

programme.title: Adrift Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Fight to Survive S2 - "Adrift Pt. 1"
programme.desc: In what is regarded as one of greatest survival stories of the 20th Century, sailor Steven Callahan finds himself alone and adrift in a life raft after his boat, the Napoleon Solo, sinks in the mid Atlantic.

programme.title: Nicosia
programme.desc: Josh is in Cyprus for a local exploring adventure across the island on a roadtrip from Nicosia to an abandoned amusement park, an asbestos mine and a shipwreck.

programme.title: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Epic Exploring S2 - "New Orleans"
programme.desc: Cody is with Lexi Limitless in the ‘Big Easy’ to explore New Orleans, visiting an abandoned Charity Hospital before meeting Brutus, the giant alligator.

programme.title: Yerevan
programme.desc: Josh goes local exploring in Armenia and its capital Yerevan, visiting some amazing abandoned Soviet buildings, a knitting factory and a luxurious hotel.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A Canadian MTB adventurer explores Madagascar and shows the behind the scenes processes of making a film.

programme.title: Norway
programme.desc: An Irish MTB pro rider discovers and rides the most amazing trails that Norway has to offer from the mountains to the ocean.

programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: We follow one of the best MTB riders and trail-builders on the planet during a trip in Alaska, one of the most remote and wild places in the world.

programme.title: Meet the Smiths
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "Meet the Smiths"
programme.desc: Terry finally gets to compare himself to Brad Pitt!! Terry and Larry test 3 scenes from action film Mr. and Mrs. Smith. Can a refrigerator or elevator door protect our heroes? Also, can you ignite a gas line with just a bullet? Larry may not look as stunning as Angelina Jolie, but he will help Terry find out the answers.

programme.title: Nightmare on Hollywood Weapons
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "Nightmare on Hollywood Weapons"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry get to test several scenes from Horror films! Terry wants to find out what is the best way to kill a Zombie, just in case he ever ends up in a Zombie Apocalypse, and they will test a scene from the horror classic, Freddie vs. Jason!

programme.title: All for One!
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "All for One!"
programme.desc: Terry travels back in time to see if he can make it as a Three Musketeer! Can he throw his sword and kill the enemy? Can the cross that he wears around his neck stop a bullet? Can a lead ball ignite from a black powder ignite a carriage full of black powder and brandy? Terry enlists the help of his companions to find out!

programme.title: Croatia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Running the World S1 - "Croatia"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Croatia to meet up with local parkour experts and undertake an epic run in an abandoned aluminium factory.

programme.title: Santorini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Running the World S1 - "Santorini"
programme.desc: A challenge to race each other and a labyrinth of narrow streets and hidden passages to navigate will make this one of the trickiest challenges.

programme.title: Best of ep. 1 to 5
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 1 to 5"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave look back over their travels so far and discuss the best places for practising parkour.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie goes to Hollywood arriving in a million dollar V12 Ferrari. In the ‘City of Angels’ Alex is brought into contact with the Brotherhood of Racing, a community of drivers looking to create safe racing conditions for amateurs.

programme.title: Houston
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Houston"
programme.desc: Given special access to a 2 million dollar exclusive McClaren Senna, Supercar Blondie digs under the surface to uncover gang feuds in the SLAB (Slow, Low and Bangin’) community and meets up with legendary hip hop artists Slim Thug and Paul Wall.

programme.title: Papua New Guinea
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Epic Trails S2 - "Papua New Guinea"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson visits wild and remote villages in Papua New Guinea, as he challenges himself on one of the world’s most difficult trails—the Kokoda Track.

programme.title: Sao Paulo, Brazil
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Sao Paulo, Brazil"
programme.desc: Russian Bgirl Kastet is visiting Sao Paulo, the home of Bboy Neguin. Together they will explore the dance, breaking and hip hop culture in the streets of Sao Paulo. Meeting up with legends and learning Capoeira, Jiu Jitsu and Passinho.

programme.title: Las Vegas, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Las Vegas, USA"
programme.desc: Brazilian Bboy Neguin is visiting his friend Bboy Ronnie in his hometown Las Vegas. Ronnie istaking Neguin to meet all the different artists and dancers who are able to make a living inVegas by doing what they love most: performing on stage.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Tokyo, Japan"
programme.desc: Vegas Bboy Ronnie is traveling to Japan to visit Bboy Shigekix in his hometown Tokyo. Shigekix will take Ronnie on an exciting Journey to show the Japanese culture and its unique style of breaking and hip-hop.

programme.title: Skullbase
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skullbase"
programme.desc: The Walsh twins reveal why water safety crews and rescue teams are the unsung heroes of big wave surfing.

programme.title: Impact Zone
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Impact Zone"
programme.desc: Francisco Porcella displays the unquenchable spirit that drives the desire to chase big waves.

programme.title: Jackfruit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Jackfruit"
programme.desc: In Balis lush landscapes, Lauren explores the tropical origin of jackfruit, partnering with a Balinese chef to unveil age-old recipes and techniques, showcasing how this versatile fruit reigns supreme in traditional and modern dishes.

programme.title: Rice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Rice"
programme.desc: Delve into the world of rice with Lauren as she explores different varieties, shares tricks, and puts her own twist on unique rice-based dishes, blending local and western recipes to create flavorful meals like Balinese Nasi Goreng and Risotto.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Running the World S1 - "London"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to London where they are challenged to create a run in the Olympic Park.

programme.title: Paris
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Running the World S1 - "Paris"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to France where they are challenged to create a run in historic Lisses.

programme.title: We are Greater than we know.
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Road to Dharma S1 - "We are Greater than we know."
programme.desc: We finish at the Sacred Ganga River, where we began. The riders reflect on their journey and the idea of freedom has set in fully. It is our responsibility for choosing how we see the world.To embrace power, It takes courage, discipline and strength.

programme.title: Marriage Lows
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Marriage Lows"
programme.desc: Jason experiences insecurity about challenges that the couple are, quite literally, dropped into. From falling out of the sky to a rappel into a dark cave, will the couple be able to work together or will they end up stranded in the dark?

programme.title: You Do What?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Love On The Rocks S1 - "You Do What?"
programme.desc: The couple head to south western Oklahoma to climb at Quartz Mountain, but when Jasons confidence is shaken during a failed slab climb, Tayler realizes she may need to prepare to carry a larger load on their journey out west.

programme.title: Know Pain, Know Gain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Know Pain, Know Gain"
programme.desc: Failed rock climbing, failed training...struggling marriage? When everything seems to have gone wrong on their road trip in Oklahoma, Tayler and Jason are faced with the question..."are we biting off more than we can chew?" as they head to Wyoming.

programme.title: Andrew Kennedy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Back Home S1 - "Andrew Kennedy"
programme.desc: Comedian Andrew Kennedy returns to the country he left shortly after birth, Colombia, to explore his roots and even try his hand at standup comedy - in Spanish.

programme.title: Nicole Chavez
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Back Home S1 - "Nicole Chavez"
programme.desc: Join stylist to the stars, Nicole Chavez, as she travels back home to Mexico to learn about the amazing fashion and styles of her grandparents birthplace.

programme.title: Mikey Garcia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Back Home S1 - "Mikey Garcia"
programme.desc: Join world champion boxer Mikey Garcia as he travels back home to Mexico to get a closer glimpse at the country thats given birth to some of the greatest fighters in history.

programme.title: Zam Expeditions and Kangya Pan Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Zam Expeditions and Kangya Pan Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina travels to Mana Pools to experience the wilderness in the dry season. Her guide, Cloud, takes her on an expedition to find lion cubs and wild dog puppies. Richard guides Kristina into her closest encounter yet with a wild bull elephant.

programme.title: Camp Amalinda
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Camp Amalinda"
programme.desc: Kristina journeys to Camp Amalinda. Her guide, Dardley, shares some of the history of this World Heritage Site and intriguing rock paintings. They track white rhino on foot and she learns about the distinctive rock formations.

programme.title: Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge"
programme.desc: Dardley joins Kristina at Ivory Lodge on the edge of Hwange National Park where her predator sightings just keep getting better. They get unbelievably close to wild cheetah and witness a cheetah hunt. Do the cheetah succeed in what they were after?

programme.title: Athens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Athens"
programme.desc: Two American street artists try to turn a school into a piece of art. Seems impossible, but this duo turns out to be a real American Dream Team.

programme.title: Bangalore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Bangalore"
programme.desc: Two worlds collide in one of the busiest cities in the world when Mexico’s most famous street artist is meeting his equivalent on their home turf in India.

programme.title: Rotterdam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Rotterdam"
programme.desc: Two European street artists are teaming up in the Netherlands for the ultimate Street Art Challenge but Mother Nature seems to be doing everything to ruin it.

programme.title: Miami
programme.desc: James Lance gets to grips with his Colombian roots while trying to build a career as a Latin hip hop artist. After raising himself as a teenager, he refuses to give up and dreams of a better future.

programme.title: Houston
programme.desc: Jamie Hancock was raised in Houston’s South Park area, a place notorious for gang violence, but also where hip hop artists created a new sound. Today, a new positive message is being created by people like Jamie through music.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Streets S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Los Angeles based electronic music producer and DJ Moe Espinosa, aka Drumcell, has created sonic soundscapes which tell cinematic stories with his music. Moe has always tried to avoid commercialism and by having a vision that remains independent.

programme.title: From Grabouw to Botriver
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Grabouw to Botriver"
programme.desc: A wine farm surrounded by mountains, a day of hiking and picnics, and delectable food paired with premium wine is on the itinerary for Xander and his team as they make their way from Grabouw to Botrivier.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: Punk rocker Jon-Mikal formed his band The Idiot Kids as a way to deal with his sexuality. After coming out to his family at 21, he uses writing and his stage performance as a form of therapy.

programme.title: France Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Road Less Traveled S3 - "France Part 2"
programme.desc: The Parisian adventure continues: Above ground after the catacombs, a parkour expert teaches our host the art of moving across an urban landscape by channeling his inner monkey boy, and as the Technoparade rolls down the Parisian streets he pulls on his connection with DJ Nick V to spin in the most electric moment.

programme.title: Jaisalmer: India’s Hidden Gem
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Journeys in India S2 - "Jaisalmer: India’s Hidden Gem"
programme.desc: Every major country has a destination that is incredible but not well known to outsiders—Jaisalmer is such a place. Once a major stop along the silk road, this living museum and surrounding countryside has something for everyone.

programme.title: Gujarat: Land of Extremes
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Journeys in India S2 - "Gujarat: Land of Extremes"
programme.desc: The people and wildlife of the western state of Gujarat have found ways to survive in an inhospitable environment. Unique big game exists side-by-side with some of the most talented and unique craftsman in the world.

programme.title: Switzerland - Jungfrau

programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Amorgos to Ios"

programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Dubrovnik"

programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In San Diego, CA an officer grapples with a combative detainee. In Portland, OR six party goers are taken into custody. In Fort Worth, TX a high-risk inmate manages to get the key to his handcuffs.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Guards uncover grooming aids stashed in an unlikely spot while combing through a womans things. An incarcerated tourist threatens to bring in Johnny Cochran for his defense, and a drunk driver awakens to find X-rated artwork drawn on his body.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Prositutes discuss their risqu̩ occupation and explain their fees. An intoxicated woman doesnt want her blood drawn, and two shoplifters face the potential consequences of their actions.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested during a dangerous drug deal struggles to face jail time. Tempers flare when a man makes threats against the arresting officers. Marijuana falls out of a man’s pockets during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is placed in isolation after disparaging other inmates. Alarms blare while a fight erupts in the shower room among inmates. A man booked into jail is revealed to have a 20-year arrest record.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman gives officers a hard time in booking when she refuses to comply. A catwoman is arrested for hitting her date at a club, and a pusherman discusses his contributions to the economy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioners actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman refuses to wear jail-issued clothing. A man tells his tearful tale to officers, and a chatty inebriated woman is placed in isolation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why hes been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers warn a man that dressing up like a clown in Texas is not a good idea. A shotgun is found in the hoodie of a man arrested for riding his bicycle without a headlight. A young couple wonders how pot ended up in their possession. Officers are surprised at the amazing amount of pot one can smoke.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman fights arrest resulting in a trip to the isolation chamber. One inmate calls 911 within jail walls causing confusion. Later, officers run to the rescue when a man passes out.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR an intoxicated male suspect is brought in for DUI. In Salt Lake City, UT a happy drunk woman is pleasantly cooperative. An emotional detainee sheds some tears while in isolation. In Las Vegas, NV a man is strapped in a restraining chair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an upset inmate damages the door on a patrol car. In Portland, OR a man over-estimates the legal consequences of his actions. In Tacoma, WA a couple charged with domestic violence denies getting physical even though there’s blood in the woman’s hair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A singer in custody performs for the officers. A woman is charged with burglary, and officers see right through a young womans tears.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Hamekytta 2
programme.desc: Hamekytan villissa jatko-osassa Martin Lawrence ja Nia Long palaavatviihdyttamaan koko perhetta. Kansakunnan turvallisuus on uhattuna ja FBI-agenttiMalcolm Turner in on jalleen kerran...

programme.title: Mama Weed
programme.desc: Kun alipalkattu poliisin tulkki huomaa takavarikon yhteydessa, etta yksi osallisista on hanen lahipiiriaan, han tekee kohtalokkaan paatoksen. Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: Jeff Chang on yliopiston priimus ja koko perheen suuri toivo. Hanen parhaat kaverinsapolkaisevat yllattaen pystyyn 21-vuotissynttarit, joten Jeffin pitaa tehda valinta.Meneeko han pirteana laaketieteellisen paasykokeeseen? Heittaytyyko han villiinyohon, joka sisaltaa drinkkeja, sylitanssia, harkaratsastusta, bodyshotteja, golfkarrykisan, katolta hyppimista, oksentamista, pukeutumista naiseksi, tappelua, biletyttoja ja ajamista kannissa? Kumman itse valitsisit?

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: Hellyttava komedia omalaatuisesta keski-ikaisesta kirjailijasta Richard Dunnista (JEFF DANIELS), jonka tyhjan paperin syndrooma on sysannyt syrjaseudulle metsastamaan inspiraatiota. Vaimonsa ja kuvitteellisen supersankarin paheksunnasta huolimatta Richard ystavystyy paikallisen samanmielisen teinityton kanssa. Toisiltaan he saavat vastaukset kysymyksiin, joita he eivat ole osanneet esittaa.

programme.title: The Beach Bum
programme.desc: The Beach Bum seuraa loppuun palaneen Moondogin (Matthew McConaughey) hillittomia epaonnenkolauksia hanen toimiessaan vain omien pelisaantojensa mukaan. Huikea tahtikaarti -Snoop Dogg, Isla Fisher, Zac Efron, Jimmy Buffett, Martin Lawrence ja Jonah Hill - takaa villin menon kumouksellissa uutuuskomediassa, jonka tarjoilee kasikirjoittaja-ohjaaja Harmony Korine.

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: PT-valmentajat (Cobie Smulders ja Guy Pearce) saavat tehtavakseen saada uusrikas ja hyvin motivoitumaton asiakas (Kevin Corrigan) kuntoon. Pian tassa fiksussa ja hauskassa rakkautta ja ruumiinkuntoa kasittelevassa komediassa naiden kolmen elama ammatti- ja yksityiselama sotkeutuu umpisolmuun.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: The Happytime Murders
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthyn tahdittama raavittoman hilliton komedia Elokuva sijoittuu Los Angelesin laitamille, jossa nuket ja ihmiset elavat rinta rinnan. Kaksi erimielista etsivaa, toinen ihminen, toinen nukke, joutuvat tyoskentelemaan yhdessa selvittaakseen kuka murhaa julmasti suositun The Happytime Gang -nukkeshow’n entisia tahtia.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: The Rules of Attraction
programme.desc: Jessica Biel, James Van Der Beek ja Ian Somerhalder tuovat elamaa ja naurua tahan rehelliseen, nokkelaan tarinaan yliopiston sosiaalisista ja seksuaalisista suhteista.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Happytime Murders
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthyn tahdittama raavittoman hilliton komedia Elokuva sijoittuu Los Angelesin laitamille, jossa nuket ja ihmiset elavat rinta rinnan. Kaksi erimielista etsivaa, toinen ihminen, toinen nukke, joutuvat tyoskentelemaan yhdessa selvittaakseen kuka murhaa julmasti suositun The Happytime Gang -nukkeshow’n entisia tahtia.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter is suspected of murder in this stirring production from writer/director Alan Le May (best known for writing The Searchers). John Drew Barrymore stars as Cooncat, a troubled young man who has to steal to survive. With no friends in West Texas, he falls in with some bad customers who involve him in some terrible crimes. The strong cast includes Chill Wills, Jack Elam, and John Archer, with cinematography by Oscar winner W. Howard Greene.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: When a boy is captured by a Native American tribe after his family is massacred, he finds solace in befriending a wild colt. Years later, following his escape, he is recaptured by a tribe who force him to battle their vicious devil horse. Yet, the horse looks familiar. Is this mysterious devil horse and the wild colt he knew years earlier one and the same? Produced by Hal Roach, who wrote the script with an assist from Stan Laurel, this little treasure was the fourth of 15 features to star Rex the Wonder Horse!

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barretts gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Son of the Renegade
programme.desc: Johnny Carpenter (who also wrote the screenplay) stars as Red River Johnny, a gunslinger returning to his home town to clear his name of some heinous accusations. This low budget howler was the only feature directed by Reg Brown, who was better known as an editor and a director of television shows. If Ed Wood directed a western, it might have looked like this one. Enjoy!

programme.title: Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: Gene Autry stars as a ranch foreman who helps a beautiful young ranch owner who faces the opposition of local ranchers after bringing a flock of sheep into cattle country. Along with the traditional title song, musical numbers include Youre the Only Star In My Blue Heaven, Buffalo Gals, and Give Me a Pony and an Open Prairie. This Republic Pictures gem includes the usual stock company of actors, with the matchless Smiley Burnette as Genes comical sidekick, Frog Millhouse. Directed by Joseph Kane; written by Gilbert Wright, Betty Burbridge; Also starring Polly Rowles, Ruth Bacon, and George Chesebro.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the Peters family, seemingly angry at the world and desiring nothing but to be left alone, arrives in Diablo, Annie, Tagg and Lofty try to find out what is making the Peters family act so hostile. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young bank teller is in trouble after a beautiful woman robs the bank. Annie steps in to try and prove the young bank tellers innocence. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An ex-convict is trying to work as a rancher, but his outlaw brother wants him to resume his life of crime. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. A pair of crooks are aware of the lands value and intend to take it for themselves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which earned a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Annie and the Twisted Trails
programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Carolyn Craig, Ewing Mitchell, and Myron Healey. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid

Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cry Blood Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: An Apache brave seeks vengeance on a band of sadistic gold hunters in this bloody drive-in western. Pitcalin (Jody McRae) leads the marauders who wipe out an Apache camp when they discover gold, only to watch their violent deeds lead to their own demise. Featuring a superb cast that also includes Dan Kemp, Robert Tessier, and Joel McRae, this coldblooded western tale was directed by character actor and filmmaker Jack Starrett (Cleopatra Jones, The Losers).

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboys beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TVs future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppys adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywoods greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: The Drifter
programme.desc: He only wants to return home to his cabin in the woods, but the man known as The Drifter finds himself involved with a murder! Director William A. OConnor, whose career included everything from drug scare movies to the early films of John Wayne, gives us a dramatic and savage tale of family secrets. With excellent performances by William Farnum and Noah Beery, The Drifter is an early talkie that still pulsates with the angst and melodrama of the silent era...

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Wisconsin to investigate an Indian agents claim that a lumber company is forcing the Chippewa Indians off their reservation in order to harvest pristine stands of pine trees. The G-Mens investigation is hindered by the distrust of the Chippewas as well as the lumbermen. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are ordered to California to investigate reports of an anthrax epidemic and get involved in murder and a feud between neighboring ranchers. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.
