programme.title: Hard Luck Love Song
programme.desc: Kantrimusiikin siivittama romanttinen draama. Hurmaava, mutta kovaonninen Jesse ajelehtii elamassaan paamaarattomasti eteenpain. Vanhan ihastuksen ilmestyessa kuvioihin, Jesse loytaa itsensa risteyskohdasta jossa hanen on paatettava jatkaako huonojen paatosten tekemista vai ryhdistaytyako.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Shes The Man
programme.desc: Viola Hastings (Amanda Bynes) kuulee kauhukseen, etta tyttojen futisjoukkue lopetetaan. Kun portti poikien joukkueeseen ei muuten aukea, Viola paattaa esiintya veljenaan Sebastianina, jonka oleskelu Lontoossa venahtaa. Mutta pojan rooli ei olekaan ihan helppo vetaa, etenkaan kun kamppiksena on sopo Duke (Channing Tatum), joka tosin on ihastunut kauniiseen Oliviaan (Laura Ramsey), joka puolestaan ihastuu herkkaan uuteen poikaan Sebastianiin... Elokuva perustuu kevytjuustoakin loysemmin Shakespearen Loppiaisaattoon.

programme.title: Youth In Revolt
programme.desc: C.D. Paynen kulttikirjasarjaan perustuva varikkaan raavi, mutta sympaattinen elokuva aalioaikuisten ymparoiman Nick Twispin elamasta. Nick rakastuu palavasti upeaan Sheeniin, mutta perhe, etaisyys ja exan vehkeilyt pitavat parin erossa. Ongelmat oikomaan Nick luo viekkaan, viiksekkaan ja itsevarman sivupersoonan Francoisen, jonka ohjaksissa asiat kuitenkin mutkistuvat entisestaan. Sekopaista tarinaa tahdittaa mm. Steve Buscemi, Ray Liotta ja Justin Long

programme.title: Le week-end
programme.desc: Nick ja Meg, viisikymppinen brittiaviopari elaa Birminghamissa, missa Meg toimii peruskoulun biologian opettajana ja Nick epamuodikkaan yliopiston filosofian opettajana. Pariskunta suuntaa rakkauden ja romantiikan kaupunkiin, Pariisiin, viikonlopuksi puhaltaakseen vanhan kipinan uudelleen liekkeihin.

programme.title: Modern Persuasion
programme.desc: Moderni versio Jane Austenin ”Viisasteleva sydan” -romaanista. Wren Cosgrove on onnellinen sinkku, joka myontaa avoimesti olevansa tyonarkomaani. Uransa huipulla han huomaa paatyvansa joka ilta kotiin kissansa luokse. Kun Owen Jasper (”se mies, joka paasi karkuun”) palkkaa Wrenin firman, vanhat tunteet heraavat ja Wren saa uuden tilaisuuden tosirakkauteen.

programme.title: My Bakery In Brooklyn
programme.desc: Vivien ja Chloe perivat Isabelle-tadiltaan pienen leipomon, joka on ilahduttanut Brooklynissa kulmakunnan asukkaita vuosikausia. Chloe haluaa panna tuulemaan ja uudistaa kaiken, kun taas Vivien haluaa varmistaa, ettei mikaan muutu. Ristiriitaan loytyy eriskummallinen ratkaisu: leipomo vedetaan viivalla puoliksi. Serkukset yrittavat paihittaa toisensa ja voittaa asiakkaat puolellensa mita eriskummallisimmilla tavoilla.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) on tavallinen tytto, josta tulee vahingossa prinsessa, kun perheen kesamatka Pariisiin muuttuu elaman laajuiseksi fantasiaksi. Grace, joka elaa kuin kuninkaallinen kahden parhaan ystavansa kanssa, huomaa, kuka han todella on – omaksumalla toisen henkilon identiteetin.

programme.title: Very Good Girls
programme.desc: New Yorkista kotoisin olevat Lily ja Gerry ovat parhaita ystavia, joilla on koko elama edessaan. He viettavat yhdessa viimeista kesaansa ennen yliopistoa ja paattavat menettaa neitsyytensa taman elamansa kesan aikana. Ikuinen ystavyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun kumpikin tytoista ihastuu samaan komeaan taiteilijaan. Viattomattomuuden aika paattyy monella tapaa.

programme.title: Cairo Time
programme.desc: Naistenlehden paatoimittaja Juliette matkaa romanttiseen Kairoon tarkoituksenaan viettaa antoisa loma aviomiehensa kanssa. YK:ssa toimivan puolison lomille paasy kuitenkin viivastyy ja miehen hyva ystava Tareq saa pitaa seuraa kauniille Juliettelle. Kaupungin ja komean oppaan lumo saavat naisen tunteet sekaisin ja han huomaa rakastuvansa uuteen paikalliseen tuttavuuteen.

programme.title: You and Me
programme.desc: Nuori kuuro nainen tapaa vastikaan sokeutuneen miehen, ja tasta kohtaamisesta saa alkunsa hauska ja koskettava rakkaustarina elaman suurista haasteista ja ilon hetkista.

programme.title: The Last Kiss
programme.desc: Vauva on tulossa! Lahestyva harmaa keski-ikaisyys ja isyyden herattamat monet tunteet hammentavat miesta, jonka pasmat sekoavat totaalisesti kun vastaan kavelee kaunis teinitytto Kim.

programme.title: Burning Man
programme.desc: Tom on huonosti kayttaytyva mies. Levoton ja karsimaton kaveri, joka harrastaa omituisia irtosuhteita ja tekee kaikkensa ajaakseen asiakkaat ravintolasta, jossa han tyoskentelee kokkimestarina. Mita tahansa han tekeekin, ihmiset hanen ymparillaan tuntuvat hyvaksyvan hanet sellaisena kuin han on. Karen on ainoa, joka yrittaa saada Tomin kantamaan vastuunsa 8-vuotiaasta pojastaan, Oscarista. Kun Tomin vihanhallinta karkaa kasista pojan syntymapaivajuhlissa, Karen joutuu noutamaan Oscarin poliisiasemalta.

programme.title: Some Girls
programme.desc: Juuri ennen haitaan menestyva kirjailija (Adam Brody) matkustelee ympari maata tapaamassa entisia tyttoystaviaan (Jennifer Morrison, Mía Maestro, Emily Watson, Zoe Kazan ja Kristen Bell) hyvittaakseen tekemansa vaaryydet.

programme.title: Touched With Fire
programme.desc: Kun kaksi bipolaarista runoilijaa, joiden taide saa voimansa mielialojen aarimmaisesta heittelysta, tapaa kuntoutuskodissa, heidan kemiansa kohtaavat valittomasti ajaen molemmat uusiin, maanisiin korkeuksiin. He seuraavat mielenterveyden rajat rikkovaa intohimoaan nousten synkkyyden alhoista huimaaville nakoalapaikoille. Lopulta heidan on valittava mielenterveyden ja rakkauden valilla.

programme.title: The Way You Look Tonight
programme.desc: Peter lahestyy kolmeakymmenta, mutta on edelleen eksyksissa ja janoaa rakkautta loputtomien ja tuloksettomien nettideittien avulla. Yhtena aamuna Peter heraa ja huomaa deittiseuransa jattaneen hanet sankyyn yksin. Peter yrittaa jattaa kaiken taakseen ja hakee taas uusia deitteja samalta sivustolta. Jokainen tapaaminen avaa aivan uuden kokemusmaailman. Se saa hanet kyseenalaistamaan kaiken, mika liittyy luonnonvoimiin, vetovoimaan ja aitoon rakkauteen. Suuri kysymys jaa vaille vastausta; voiko Peter rakastua oikeasti ja loytaa aidon rakkauden?

programme.title: We Too Together
programme.desc: Rob on tullut kotiin sodasta ja hanta vaivaa traumaperainen stressihairio. Vahitellen han saa otteen menneisyytensa hallinnasta, Joulunpyhina han tutustuu Gabrielaan ja menettaa talle sydamensa. Elamanmuutos on valtava ja elama saa taas merkityksen.

programme.title: Stay Cool
programme.desc: Menestyskirjailija Henry McCarthy palaa kotikaupunkiinsa aloittaakseen tyot opettajana. Samalla han joutuu kohtaamaan nuoruudenrakkautensa Scarletin ja hatistelemaan kimpustaan uuteen opettajaansa palavasti rakastunutta teinityttoa Shastaa.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: Yksinainen leski suunnittelee maailmanymparimatkaa aviomiehensa tuhkien kanssa kaydakseen paikoissa, joihin he ihastuivat katsomissaan elokuvissa. Matkan ensimmainen etappi muuttaa hanen elamansa iaksi.

programme.title: Cairo Time
programme.desc: Naistenlehden paatoimittaja Juliette matkaa romanttiseen Kairoon tarkoituksenaan viettaa antoisa loma aviomiehensa kanssa. YK:ssa toimivan puolison lomille paasy kuitenkin viivastyy ja miehen hyva ystava Tareq saa pitaa seuraa kauniille Juliettelle. Kaupungin ja komean oppaan lumo saavat naisen tunteet sekaisin ja han huomaa rakastuvansa uuteen paikalliseen tuttavuuteen.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Broken English
programme.desc: Nora Wilder on epatoivoinen. Hanen lahipiirissaan kaikki ovat naimisissa tai ainakin heilla on lapsia. Nora on kolmikymppinen, hanella on tylsa tyo ja aiti, joka muistuttaa Noraa jatkuvasti siita, etta tama on epaonnistunut. Surkeuden kruunaa ystavattaren taydellinen liitto. Lukuisten epaonnistuneiden treffien jalkeen Nora tapaa ranskalaisen Julienin.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) on tavallinen tytto, josta tulee vahingossa prinsessa, kun perheen kesamatka Pariisiin muuttuu elaman laajuiseksi fantasiaksi. Grace, joka elaa kuin kuninkaallinen kahden parhaan ystavansa kanssa, huomaa, kuka han todella on – omaksumalla toisen henkilon identiteetin.

programme.title: Bad Cupid
programme.desc: Archie ottaa tosissaan tehtavansa: huolehtia, etta aito rakkaus voittaa aina. Hanen toimintatapansa eivat kuitenkaan ole aina aivan tavanomaiset. Kaikki Archien tielle osuvat saavat varoa, silla han ei kaihda keinoja paatettyaan jotain.

programme.title: The Dreamers
programme.desc: Kolme elokuvantuntijaa, amerikkalainen vaihto-opiskelija Matthew seka kaksoset Theo ja Isabelle ovat tulleet laheisiksi yhteisen kiinnostuksen kohteensa vuoksi. Theon ja Isabellen epatavallinen intiimi yhteys kiehtoo Matthew’ta. Kun kaksosten vanhemmat lahtevat kuukaudeksi matkoille, Matthew saa kutsun asumaan heidan luokseen, ja he eksyvat elokuvafantasian maailmaan. The Dreamers on Oscar-palkitun Bernardo Bertoluccin romanttinen draamaelokuva, jonka paaosissa ovat Michael Pitt, Louis Garrel ja Eva Green.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: 200 Cigarettes
programme.desc: On uudenvuodenaatto New Yorkissa vuonna 1981. Monica aikoo pitaa juhlat, mutta kello yhdeksaan mennessa kukaan ilmestynyt paikalle. Hanen vieraansa ovat tulossa, mutta he eivat pida kiiretta. Kevinilla ei ole halua juhlia uutta vuotta, koska hanet on vastikaan jatetty. Val ja Stephie eksyvat ja paatyvat klubille. Bridget ja Caitlyn yrittavat paasta eroon Bridgetin poikaystavasta Ericista. Kaikki he etsivat seksia, rakkautta tai molempia.

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: Matthew och Lisa ar oskiljaktiga. Deras passionerade karlek går inte att ta miste på. Men så plotsligt forsvinner hon- lamnar honom utan ett ord- och Matthews varld rasar samman. Nu, två år senare, har Matthew borjat komma over den varsta saknaden. Men nar han plotsligt får vad han tror ar en skymt av henne i folkvimlet ar det som att han blivit traffad av blixten- han måste få se henne. Efter ett intensivt letande hittar han henne. Tror han. For nar smartan och begaret blir for stort kan den forvranga dina sinnesbilder.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The first in the season will see Catherine Bennett and her youngest daughter Sarah Jane keen to downsize from their huge 13-bedroomed house in Mullingar. Theyre planning to move down the road, where they also own a 3-bed bungalow thats been uninhabited for the last nine years.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot faces a unique challenge in Clane, Co. Kildare.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon helps Senator Katherine Zappone and Dr Ann Louise Gilligan renovate a dilapidated hunting lodge in Brittas, Dublin.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Desperate for more space, a couple with two young daughters, who have long since outgrown their tiny cottage in Killawalla outside Westport, engage Dermot to help.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot revamps a Rathfarnham four-bed to suit the changing needs of its occupants Peter, Lisa and their twins Grace and Louise (9) live in a four-bed house in Rathfarnham, Dublin 14.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: A young couple with three children seek Dermots help in revamping their small three bedroomed bungalow in Ballinteer Ailish and Patrick Bates are a young couple running out of space - fast!

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot knows exactly how to solve the problem but it means destroying a lot of the work the couple have already done.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts are up against the clock to revamp their 70s bungalow in Enniskerry before their first baby arrives.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot needs to create "a bungalow downstairs" incorporating a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living and dining room.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is normally confident about presenting a plan. But with a couple as design-literate as Greg and Siobhan, the stakes are that bit higher.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Rathcoole with Mary Moore, the design solution Dermot offers Mary is one of the most unusual and interesting he has ever conceived.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon sets out to transform peoples living spaces. Before moving in to their 1940s ex-council house in Co Kilkenny, the Kirwans added a basic extension.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot wants to turn the house completely on its head, putting the bedrooms to the front and extending the back to include a kitchen, living and dining that leads into the garden.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Templetuohy, Co. Tipperary with Joanne and Sean Cleere who believe they need a substantial extension but Dermot doesnt actually concur.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Room to Improve starts with Margaret and Jodie Burke who plan to renovate the family home in Foxrock.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Pádraig Whooley and Lorraine Dufficey spent 265 thousand euros on their remote cottage at Rossmore in West Cork, they knew that - while the hilltop location was ideal - the house was far from it.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Laytown, co.Meath, with a budget of 60,000 euros, Dermots worry "is even if you took away the shoddy workmanship youd spend the 60k, this is a really difficult one..."

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Dalkey, with a budget of 180,000 euros, he must come up with an innovative design to match their exacting requirements within the confines of an incredibly tight site.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Clontarf, with Denise and Ben who desperately want a second bathroom for their family home, but their budget is limited.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Tullow, with Tom and Lisa who want to renovate their 19th century farmhouse.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Yvonne and John live in a housing estate in Dundalk with their two children. Four years ago, they decided to buy their next-door neighbours house.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Jim and Siobhan Doyle live in a beautiful old house over looking Dublin Bay in Sutton. See Dermot Bannon transform the rambling old house into a beautiful new space.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The series begins in Cork City with our youngest and most ambitious couple yet, Meadhbh and Niall, both 27-years-old.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: After 10 successful years living in Boston, Elaine Mitchell made the decision to come back to the old sod with her earnings.

programme.title: Room to Improve

programme.desc: Marcus and Margaret are about to extend a two-bed cottage in Dundrum and share it with Marcuss beloved Aunt May.

programme.title: Deep Blue Aquarium
programme.desc: This HD Nature Relaxation Static scene lasting 1 hour features the rhythmic, trance-inducing sights and sounds of an underwater California kelp forest. Cool blues and shades of light bounce off of the dancing kelp and schools of fish; underwater sounds paired with healing ambient music by Yellow Brick Cinema adds an extra level of relaxation, making for the perfect virtual screensaver video to have on as a background video while working.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Abilene Town
programme.desc: When an uneasy truce between cattlemen and homesteaders is broken in Abilene, Texas, Marshall Dan Mitchell (Randolph Scott) must resolve the conflict as he tries to manage the two women in his life.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Coward
programme.desc: Will Morgan and his son Tom are attacked by Iroquois, but in the heat of the battle Tom runs away. When they return safely home, the settlement brands the boy a coward.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Joshua
programme.desc: When a black cavalryman returns home from the Civil War to find his mother murdered, he sets out on the trail of her killers in search of revenge.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Cimarron Strip - The Battle Of Bloody Stones
programme.desc: When a young Indian is killed after challenging the accuracy of a battle depicted in a show, Crown must prevent the young mans father, from avenging his sons death upon the star of the show.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: James Barlow (Randolph Scott) is a federal agent who is assigned to bring an end to the reign of terror brought on by a gang of train robbers. Barlow infiltrates the gang and discovers that they have been paying off local officials and finds himself caught in the middle of the good and the bad guys. Based on the exploits of the infamous Reno gang, the first train robbers in American history.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Ethan Allen Story
programme.desc: Ethan Allen and his Green Mountain Boys ride outside the law in their attempts to bring justice to the common man. Hawkeye is sent to investigate.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Mclintock
programme.desc: Cattle baron George Washington McLintock battles his headstrong wife (Maureen OHara), a ranch hand (Patrick Wayne) who wants to marry his daughter (Stefanie Powers) and evil-doers in this upbeat comedy Western with a memorable ending.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Delaware Hoax
programme.desc: The Delaware tribe is framed for a murder they didnt commit and theyre ready to go to war against the white settlers. Hawkeye learns that a scheming land speculator is to blame and goes undercover to bring justice.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Blair buys a worthless stage line to a ghost town, then races to win a mail contract. Early John Wayne Western blending action, grit, and frontier determination in under an hour.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Cimarron Strip - The Hunted
programme.desc: When two outlaw brothers surrender claiming self-defense, bounty hunters close in. After one is killed, the other seeks revenge, forcing Marshal Crown to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Abilene Town
programme.desc: When an uneasy truce between cattlemen and homesteaders is broken in Abilene, Texas, Marshall Dan Mitchell (Randolph Scott) must resolve the conflict as he tries to manage the two women in his life.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Cimarron Strip - The Hunted

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Daniel Boone - Trail Blazer
programme.desc: Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) builds a home in Kentucky’s 18th-century wilderness, defending Boonesborough settlers from Shawnee raids and British attacks.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Witch
programme.desc: A series of mysterious events lead the people of a settlement to believe that a witch is afoot. A woman will be burned at the stake unless Hawkeye can find the real culprit.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Jesse James Women
programme.desc: Jesse James is involved with four women: a saloon keeper, a banker’s daughter, a singer and a cattle baroness. Their ties, often driven by gain, ignite rivalry and tension.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Cimarron Strip - The Battle Of Bloody Stones
programme.desc: When a young Indian is killed after challenging the accuracy of a battle depicted in a show, Crown must prevent the young mans father, from avenging his sons death upon the star of the show.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: A group of West Point graduates are assigned to the U.S. Cavalry in Kansas during the time of abolitionist John Brown. Stars Ronald Reagan.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Medicine Man
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachgook save an aging Oneida medicine man from certain death and learn about a plot to rob settlers.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Mclintock
programme.desc: Cattle baron George Washington McLintock battles his headstrong wife (Maureen OHara), a ranch hand (Patrick Wayne) who wants to marry his daughter (Stefanie Powers) and evil-doers in this upbeat comedy Western with a memorable ending.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Servant
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachgook find a runaway Irish girl wandering alone in the forest. They learn that she is an indentured servant who was sold into slavery.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.desc: A gang member misled by his leader kidnaps Dulcey, vowing to release her only if the ruthless Arn Tinker is arrested and hanged. Emotions run high in this gripping episode.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.desc: A gang member misled by his leader kidnaps Dulcey, vowing to release her only if the ruthless Arn Tinker is arrested and hanged. Emotions run high in this gripping episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last years injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) and Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. Well see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

Carmel, Indiana, is an affluent suburb just north of Indianapolis known for low crime rates and some of the country’s best public schools.

programme.title: My life in a hotel room: Ireland’s hidden homeless crisis

programme.title: Kherson: from heaven of Ukrainian liberation to hell of Russian bombardment
programme.desc: The southern city of Kherson was liberated from Russian occupation in November 2022 by Ukrainian forces, sparking ecstatic scenes in the main square.

programme.title: Inside Just Stop Oil: the hooligan climate protesters taking on the tankers
programme.desc: Damien Gayle, a Guardian environment correspondent, follows a group of climate activists as they try to paralyse the UKs fossil fuel distribution network. We film with him as the protesters break into oil terminals, glue themselves to the road, climb onboard oil tankers and let down their tyres.

programme.title: Fighting addiction on Pine Ridge reservation

programme.title: Scars

programme.title: 7 October attack one year on: Inside an Israeli kibbutz terrorised by Hamas
programme.desc: Before Hamas’s rampage through southern Israel on 7 October, the kibbutz of Nir Oz was home to 400 people. It was a lively community that had historically enjoyed good relationships with the population in neighbouring Gaza.

programme.title: The Apache war against copper mining: this is an act of desecration
programme.desc: Chí’chil Biłdagoteel - otherwise known as Oak Flat, Arizona – is regarded as sacred ancestral land by the Apache people.

programme.title: Victory Road 2023
programme.desc: Wrestlers face off on their way to the illustrious Victory Road!

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Kuolettavista vammoistaan parannettu Elektra (Jennifer Garner) elaa tappamiselle maailman vaarallisimpana palkkamurhaajana. Uusin sopimus pakottaa hanet kuitenkin tekemaan ratkaisun, jonka seuraukset johtavat aarimmaiseen hyvan ja pahan taisteluun.

programme.title: Miamin superkytat
programme.desc: 20 miljoonaa taalaa ryostetaan royhkeasti detroitilaisesta pankista. Vain yksi kolmesta ryostajasta saadaan kiinni, eika rahoja koskaan loydeta. Nyt, seitseman vuoden kakun jalkeen, kiinnisaatu ryostaja paasee vihdoin vapaalle jalalle. Han suuntaa valittomasti Miamiin ja viranomaiset ovat varmoja, etta kadonnut ryostosaalis loytyy miehen jalkia seuraamalla Floridan paratiisicityn alamaailmasta.Haastavaan tehtavaan valitaan FBI:n valioyksilot: Doug Bennet ja Steve Forest. Doug ja Steve saapuvat Miamiin ja pistavat tuulemaan. Nama kaverit toimivat ensin ja esittavat kysymykset sen jalkeen, eika rikollisten uhmaaminen paljain nyrkeinkaan ole heille ongelma - painvastoin!

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Lahjakas asianajaja Casey McKay matkustaa ex-vaimonsa kotikaupunkiin puolustamaan taman veljea, jota syytetaan piirisyyttajan murhasta. Siella McKay saa selville salaliiton, joka johtaa hanet avoimeen konfliktiin kaupungin korruptoituneimman rakennuttajan Gatesin kanssa. Entinen merijalkavaen sotilas auttaa Caseyta, kun kay ilmi, etta han tarvitsee muutakin kuin juridista asiantuntemusta pysyakseen hengissa ja voittaakseen jutun

programme.title: Ghost Rider - Koston Henki
programme.desc: Tulella tulta vastaan! Johnny Blaze taistelee edelleen kiroustaan vastaan paholaisen palkkionmetsastajana. Kun salainen uskonnollinen lahko palkkaa hanet tehtavaan, han ei tunne olevansa valmis kayttamaan Ghost Riderin voimiaan ja valtaansa jalleen kerran. Mutta tama saattaa olla viimeinen tilaisuus vapautua paholaisen kirouksesta lopullisesti!

programme.title: Banana Joe
programme.desc: Banaani Joen elama on yhta auringonpaistetta. Lokoisaa iloista oloa, ilman stressia etelaisella paratiisisaarella, kunnes... Joen asuinkyla on jaamassa modernin business-kulttuurin jalkoihin. Pian paikkaa pyorittavat byrokraatit ja jengit, pykalineen ja paheineen. Korruptio ja saantoviidakko alkavat rehottaa paratiisissa, ja huoleton vapauden aurinko on jaamassa pahasti pyrkyreiden ja rahastajien varjoon. Joe ei lainkaan pida siita mita on tapahtumassa, eika ole valmis luopumaan idyllisesta paratiisistaan ilman taistelua. On aika takoa nyrkein joidenkin paahan jarkea, ja nayttaa mista kuuluu ja kuka kaskee!

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3
programme.desc: Eletaan 1600-luvun alkua feodaaliajan Japanissa, ja ratsain kulkeva mies jaa vangiksi taistelussaan samurairyhmaa vastaan. Vajaat 400 vuotta myohemmin toimittaja April O’Neil hankkii kirpputorilta lahjoja kilpikonnaystavilleen. Tavarat ovat enimmakseen harmittomia, mutta Tikku-mentori saa vanhan japanilaisen valtikan. Valtikka katkee sisalleen taikavoimia, ja yhtakkia sankarimme loytavat itsensa samuraiden Japanista, jossa he paatyvat keskelle kilpailevien laaninherrojen sotaa.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: Survivor on sahakka vakoiluelokuva Kate Abbottista, joka saa siirron Yhdysvaltain suurlahetystoon Lontooseen. Hanen tehtavanaan on varmistaa, ettei terroristeille myonneta viisumeja Yhdysvaltoihin. Erikoislaatuinen tehtava tekee Abbottista silmatikun ja maalitaulun. Hanet yritetaan murhata ja lavastaa rikolliseksi. Abbottin taytyy yrittaa pelastaa maineensa ja estaa uudenvuodenaatoksi suunniteltu terroristi-isku New Yorkin Times Squarella.

programme.title: Buddy villissa lannessa
programme.desc: Trinity –veli Bud Spencer jalleen vauhdissa Villissa Lannessa. Hujari Buddya luullaan laakariksi, kun hanen kaverinsa Cocoa varastaa vahingossa laukun taynna kirurgin valineita. Han asettuu pikkukaupungin laakariksi, joka kayttaa omaperaisia menetelmia. Kun hurjat rikolliset yrittavat vallata kultakaivoksen paalla sijaitsevan kaupungin, paasevat Buddyn todelliset kyvyt esiin. Han on mestari lyomaan turpaan saveltajaleganda Ennio Morriconen saveltaman musiikin tahtiin!

programme.title: Texas Red
programme.desc: Tositarina legendaarisesta Texas Redista, afroamerikkalaisesta miehesta, jota sadat laittomat cowboyt jahtasivat rajusti pitkin preerian karua maisemaa Mississippin talvisen eramaan halki. Kaikki halutuimman palkinnon saamiseksi.

programme.title: Cold Zone
programme.desc: Myrsky lahestyy. Kukaan ei pysty ennustamaan sita. Kukaan ei pysty mittaamaan sen voimaa. Yhden perheen on pakko kestaa se. Kukaan ei voi etsia suojaa myrskylta, kukaan ei paase pois kylmasta...

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: Dragon ja Bull tappavat aikaa lahinna vetelehtimalla ja naisia jahtaamalla. Etenkin yhta naista, johon Dragon on erityisen ihastunut. Epaonnistuttuaan rakkauskirjeen lahettamisessa tutkapari joutuu yllattaen rikollisjengin paamajan katolle. Jengi varastaa arvokkaita artefakteja kaupungin temppelista ja salakuljettaa niita ahneille lansimaalaisille, mutta Dragon ja Bull tuntevat ensimmaista kertaa vastuunsa ja paattavat ottaa jengin hoitaakseen.

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Jack (Edward Norton) karsii unettomuudesta ja yrittaa paeta tylsaa elamaansa. Han tapaa karismaattisen Tyler Durdenin (Brad Pitt), joka uskoo itsetuhoon elaman suolana, ja yhdessa he perustavat salaisen tappelukerhon, Fight Clubin, jonka suosio on valtava.

programme.title: Harsh Times
programme.desc: Veriset painajaisunet vainoavat ex-ranger Jim Davisia, joka on palannut kotikaupunkiinsa Los Angelesiin palveltuaan erikoisjoukoissa Irakissa. Han odottaa tyotarjousta Los Angelesin poliisivoimilta, mutta kun mitaan ei ala kuulua, veteraanin turhautuneisuus kasvaa. Ja yhdessa lapsuudenystava Miken kanssa Jim paattaa nollata tilanteen oikein kunnolla. Paihteiden ja pohjattoman uhon voimin kaksikko paastaa helvetin valloilleen Losin pahamaineisimmassa getossa, South Centralissa.

programme.title: Shockwave
programme.desc: Kun valtava vulkaaninen myrsky koettelee maailmaa, geofyysikko Kate Ferris yrittaa vakuuttaa puolustusministeriolle, etta se ei ole luonnonilmio. Se on seurausta seismisen superaseen Hell Stormin aktivoitumisesta. Kate joutuu keksimaan keinon, jolla pysayttaa sokkiaalto, ennen kuin se uhkaa koko ihmiskuntaa.

programme.title: Power Rangers
programme.desc: Power Rangers on viiden tavallisen lukiolaisen tarina. He loytavat ikivanhan avaruusaluksen ja huomaavat yhtakkia saaneensa yliluonnolliset voimat. Viisikko akkaa, etta muukalaiset aikovat tuhota heidan pienen kotikaupunkinsa Angel Groven ja siina samassa koko maailman, joten heidan on ryhdyttava maailmanpelastajiksi.

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: Dragon ja Bull tappavat aikaa lahinna vetelehtimalla ja naisia jahtaamalla. Etenkin yhta naista, johon Dragon on erityisen ihastunut. Epaonnistuttuaan rakkauskirjeen lahettamisessa tutkapari joutuu yllattaen rikollisjengin paamajan katolle. Jengi varastaa arvokkaita artefakteja kaupungin temppelista ja salakuljettaa niita ahneille lansimaalaisille, mutta Dragon ja Bull tuntevat ensimmaista kertaa vastuunsa ja paattavat ottaa jengin hoitaakseen.

programme.title: Senkka nenasta pojat!
programme.desc: Jarjestaytyneen rikollisuuden vedonlyojat, korttihait ja huijarit piinaavat toimillaan Miamia, ja poliisin johto on paattanyt ottaa kovat keinot kayttoon ja puhdistaa kaupungin. Mutta koska poliisin omat resurssit eivat riita toivottuun lopputulokseen, varvataan veljekset, Johnny ja Charlie Flippo, likaisen tyon hommaan...Vaikka Johnny on laivaston upseeri ja Charlie vain rekkakuski, on heidan urbaanit selviytymiskykynsa ja kontaktit legendaariset. Veljekset sukeltavat alamaailman kuvioihin kuin kalat veteen, ja pistavat taidoillaan seka nyrkeillaan rikollisten paat sekaisin! Mutta Johnny ja Charlie eivat ole kuvioissa mukana hyvaa hyvyyttaan - taytyyhan omista eduista pitaa myos kiinni.

programme.title: Sightings
programme.desc: Tieteiselokuvamysteeri teksasilaisella ranchilla asuvasta riitaisasta perheesta, jota uhkaa metsassa piileksiva olio. Selviytyakseen hengissa uhkasta, heidan on samalla ratkaistava omat sisaiset ristiriitansa.

programme.title: Spaghettiman
programme.desc: Clarkilla ei ole myotatuntoa millekaan eika kenellekaan. Han ei valita tippaakaan maailmasta, jossa me elamme, tuskin itsestaankaan. Mutta vanhan, spagettia taynna olevan kattilan ja rikkinaisen mikron kanssa sattuneen tapahtuman jalkeen jokin menee taysin pieleen. Clark muuttuu supersankariksi, joka voi taistella rikollisuutta vastaan spagetilla. Mutta siina on yksi koukku - hanelle pitaa maksaa.

programme.title: Banana Joe
programme.desc: Banaani Joen elama on yhta auringonpaistetta. Lokoisaa iloista oloa, ilman stressia etelaisella paratiisisaarella, kunnes... Joen asuinkyla on jaamassa modernin business-kulttuurin jalkoihin. Pian paikkaa pyorittavat byrokraatit ja jengit, pykalineen ja paheineen. Korruptio ja saantoviidakko alkavat rehottaa paratiisissa, ja huoleton vapauden aurinko on jaamassa pahasti pyrkyreiden ja rahastajien varjoon. Joe ei lainkaan pida siita mita on tapahtumassa, eika ole valmis luopumaan idyllisesta paratiisistaan ilman taistelua. On aika takoa nyrkein joidenkin paahan jarkea, ja nayttaa mista kuuluu ja kuka kaskee!

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: Charlie Bond on tienhaarassa elamassaan. Han on eronnut hiljattain vaimostaan, kun hanta pyydetaan huolehtimaan viikonloppuna pojastaan Leosta. Huono ajoitus, silla Charlie on juuri toteuttamassa taidevarkautta helpon rahan toivossa. Leo ei tieda suunnitelmasta mitaan, han odottaa vain, etta saisi olla kaivatun isan kanssa. Samalla todellisuus saa Charlien kiinni; haikailemattomat ammattitappajat jahtaavat hanta. Hanen ainoa toivonsa on paeta maasta ja parantaa suhteensa Leoon, jota han on laiminlyonyt monet vuodet.

programme.title: Reunalla
programme.desc: Uskallatko ottaa seuraavan askeleen? Vankikarkuri Nick Cassidy ilmestyy yhtakkia pilvenpiirtajan reunukselle New Yorkissa. Aikooko han hypata? Pian kaikkien tiedotusvalineiden ja koko kaupungin huomio kiinnittyy Nickiin. Ja kun kaikki katsovat ylospain, kukaan ei huomaa ovelaa ryostoa, joka tehdaan kadun toisella puolella. Liittyvatko tapaukset toisiinsa? Paaseeko poliisipsykologi Linda totuuden jaljille? Ja onko Nickilla oikeasti jokin aivan toinen suunnitelma?

programme.title: The Fourth Musketeer
programme.desc: Nuori dArtagnan matkustaa isansa puolesta Gasconyn maaseudulta Pariisiin, jossa han on mukana kuninkaan muskettisoturien ja kardinaali Richelieun vartijoiden valisessa ovelassa ja erittain monimutkaisessa juonessa. Veri vuodatetaan, ja niiden, jotka eivat ole varuillaan, on asetettava henkensa vaaraan.

programme.title: Ghost Rider - Koston Henki
programme.desc: Tulella tulta vastaan! Johnny Blaze taistelee edelleen kiroustaan vastaan paholaisen palkkionmetsastajana. Kun salainen uskonnollinen lahko palkkaa hanet tehtavaan, han ei tunne olevansa valmis kayttamaan Ghost Riderin voimiaan ja valtaansa jalleen kerran. Mutta tama saattaa olla viimeinen tilaisuus vapautua paholaisen kirouksesta lopullisesti!

programme.title: Flight World War II
programme.desc: Nykyaikaisen 757:n matkustajat tekevat aikamatkan takaisin 1940-luvulle ja joutuvat kamppailemaan hengestaan keskella saksalaisten ja liittoutuneitten taistelua. Yrittaessaan pysya hengissa he onnistuvat vaikuttamaan historiaan ja toisen maailmansodan loppuratkaisuun.

programme.title: Gun
programme.desc: Kun ampumistapaukset rumentavat liiaksi Detroitin rikostilastoja, aloittaa poliisivoimat sodan laittoman asekaupan kitkemiseksi. Heidan tahtaimessaan on erityisesti pahamaineinen Rich (Curtis ”50 Cent” Jackson). Epaonnistumiset ja epailyt saavat Richin, hanen ystavansa Angelin (Val Kilmer) ja rakastajansa Gabriellan muodostaman ryhman valit rakoilemaan ja suuri salaisuus on paljastumassa…

programme.title: A Good Man
programme.desc: Erikoisjoukoissa maineikkaan, mutta katastrofiin paattyneen uransa jalkeen Alexander (Seagal) vetaytyy viettamaan hiljaiseloa Romaniaan.

programme.title: Dangerous Man
programme.desc: Shane Daniels on istunut syyttomana kaltereiden takana jo 15 vuotta, mutta paasee vihdoin vapauteen. Sattumalta han nakee rikollisten verisen valienselvittelyn ja joutuu mukaan raakaan panttivankidraamaan. Shanen tuore vapaus on vaakalaudalla, kun han taistelee korruptoituneessa alamaailmassa pelastaakseen viattoman tyton hengen.

programme.title: Meidan gangstereiden kesken
programme.desc: Painija Charlie ja jaatelonmyyja Sonny ovat huolettomia ja mukavia kavereita, jotka pysyttelevat poissa vaikeuksista. Mutta kun kaupungin ja alamaailman johtaja erehtyy luulemaan heita pahamaineiseksi tappajakaksikoksi, kaikki muuttuu... Pelastaakseen omat nahkansa Charlie ja Sonny pysyvat vaiti todellisista henkilollisyyksistaan ja pelaavat mukana hamatakseen gangstereita. Kun Charlie ja Tom saavat tehtavakseen hoidella kilpaileva perhe paivilta, ei heille jaa muuta mahdollisuutta kuin ottaa ohjat omiin kasiinsa... Bud Spencerin ystavaa Sonnya nayttelee Giuliano Gemma. Han on muun muassa vaikuttanut spaghettiwesternelokuvassa ”Ringo - tappaja” ja Dario Argenton jannarissa ”Tenebre”.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This weeks episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, hes got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This weeks episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. Its a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and cant wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworxs cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent

Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canadas leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marinos busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Lauras going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesnt want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent

Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style theyll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
