programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh.

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 3
programme.desc: With the help of his father’s spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated Bakura’s Diabound and stopped Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 4
programme.desc: The secret is out! The Pharaoh’s journey was more than a trip to the past – it’s the greatest Shadow Game ever created!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 5
programme.desc: Zorc’s incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound!

programme.title: Name of the Game
programme.desc: Karim is the next to fall under the bandit Bakura’s assault, and the ravaging robber won’t stop until he conquers the rest!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 1
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: In the Name of the Pharaoh
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba’s combined strength couldn’t defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Final Journey
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel... Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: The time of destiny is now! Yugi vs. Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Not only does Atem still have all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn’t have a single monster on the field!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem – more than friends, closer than brothers.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Seeing his father carded in front of his eyes, Yuyas rage reaches a boiling point as he accepts Yuris challenge. But not only does he have to contend with Yugo and Yuris dragons, but Zarcs ever growing influence over him.

programme.title: Time to Reunite!
programme.desc: The four dimensions start to fuse together as Yuya continues to struggle against Yuri. Forced to discard his trump card, things seem hopeless. Yuyas friends then arrive to encourage him to keep fighting no matter what.

programme.title: A Most Brutal Duel
programme.desc: Yuya absorbs all of his counterparts and reclaimed his true form as Supreme King Z-ARC. Starting to lay waste to the Fusion Dimension, Sora and Edo challenge Zarc to try and reach out to Yuyas spirit.

programme.title: A Dark Summoning
programme.desc: The four dimensions continue to unite as Zarc effortlessly crushes Sora and Edo. Kaito and Shun continue the fight against Zarc while people from Heartland and Neo Domino City start appearing in the Fusion Dimension.

programme.title: Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Gongenzaka and Jack fight against Zarc next, trying their best to reach out to Yuyas soul buried in Zarcs darkness. A revived Crow and Sawatari decide to join in when Zarcs Supreme King Dragons swarm the field.

programme.title: Clash Talk
programme.desc: Crow notices that Zarc is starting to lose his composure, leading him and Sawatari to up their game against Zarcs dragons. As dimensional integration is getting closer to completion, Reiji tries to convince his dad to stop Zarc.

programme.title: A Ray of Hope
programme.desc: Rays soul possesses Reira so she can battle against Zarc alongside Reiji. Zarc boasts that he is the creator of Pendulum Summon, but Ray is determined to stop him once and for all using the four natural energy cards.

programme.title: Swinging Back into Action
programme.desc: Things have seemingly returned to normal in the Pendulum Dimension, but Yuya gets the feeling that something is missing. Reiji has him duel against Tsukikage to restore his memories and make him finish the Lancers goal for good.

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 1
programme.desc: The hunt for the Mythyrian Numbers leads our heroes to the peak of a perilous mountain where Kite’s skills are put to the test by a dragon-wielding Number Guardian!

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Furry Fury
programme.desc: After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there’s more to Girag than meets the eye – like a red nose and whiskers!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 1
programme.desc: It’s rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle beneath the ocean reaches new depths of danger when Shark comes face to face with the Number Guardian, Abyss!

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 1
programme.desc: Earth and Astral World are under attack! Yuma and Astral are the only ones who can stop it, but saving their planets may come at the ultimate price…

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between our two heroes and Number 96 comes to a shocking conclusion that leaves only one person standing!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone’s stealing memories, and the Super Secret Numbers Club are going to find out who! But when the hunters become the hunted, Yuma’s friends quickly realize that they need help from an exterminator!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Trey team up to take down a bugged out Barian who likes to munch on memories! Can Yuma and Trey swat down this winged menace before he swoops in to drain their brains?

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 1
programme.desc: With Vector’s patience for failure fading fast, Mr. Heartland begs for a final chance to beat Yuma! Desperate to deliver, Heartland deploys his most dangerous duelist to date, a treacherous Barian armed with toxic tentacles!

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 2
programme.desc: Shark and Quattro struggle to keep their heads above water as they battle the Barian duelist from the deep, Chironex!

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s all set to travel across the stars to save Astral, but an unexpected pest pops by to plunder Yuma’s plans!

programme.title: Ruckkehr ins Reich der Schatten (2)
programme.desc: Im Halbfinalduell Yami-Marik gegen Joey behalt Yami-Marik die Oberhand. Er spielt so viele Fallenkarten, dass Joey kaum noch eine Chance hat. Im letzten Moment zieht er Jinzo und vernichtet damit Yami-Mariks Fallenkarten. Joey glaubt sich auf der sicheren Seite, da zieht Yami-Marik Lava Golem. Dafur werden zwei Monster auf Joeys Seite geopfert. Im Gegenzug dazu erhalt er Mariks Monsterkarte Lava Golem mit einer Angriffsstarke von 3000 Punkten. Jetzt ist Joey am Zug. Yami-Marik fordert ihn zu einem Angriff heraus. Wo ist der Haken?

programme.title: Ruckkehr ins Reich der Schatten (3)
programme.desc: Nachdem Yami-Marik lange Zeit das Duell beherrscht hat, dreht Joey den SpieSS um. Es sieht ganz danach aus, als konnte er Marik besiegen. Da holt Yami-Marik den Geflugelten Drachen des Ra vom Friedhof. Und obwohl dieser aufgrund der fehlenden Monsteropferung keine Angriffspunkte besitzt, ist er dank seiner besonderen Fahigkeit, sich in Phoenix zu verwandeln, ein machtiger Kampfer, der auch ohne Angriffspunkte vernichtend zuschlagen kann. Der zu erwartende Schlag durfte Joey zwar nicht im Duell besiegen, ihm jedoch seine gesamte Lebensenergie rauben.

programme.title: Ruckkehr ins Reich der Schatten (4)
programme.desc: Marik setzt seine agyptische Gotterkarte transmutiert als Phoenix gegen Joey ein. Da sie null Angriffspunkte besitzt, schadet das zwar Joeys Lebenspunkten uberhaupt nicht, aber der Schlag raubt ihm soviel Lebensenergie, dass er trotz aller Willensanstrengung ohnmachtig zusammenbricht. Marik hat das Duell gewonnen. Als nachstes treten Kaiba und Yugi gegeneinander an. Wird es Yugi gelingen aus dem Battle City Turnier als Sieger hervorzugehen? Das Schicksal der Welt hangt von ihm ab.

programme.title: Duell im Kolosseum (1)
programme.desc: Um das Duell zwischen Yugi und sich selbst entsprechend zu wurdigen, lasst Kaiba das Halbfinale im Kolosseum stattfinden. Er scheint das Duell zu kontrollieren, mit einem Trick knopft er Yugi Slifer den Himmelsdrachen ab, aber Yugi erobert ihn wieder zuruck.

programme.title: Duell im Kolosseum (2)
programme.desc: Durch kluges Taktieren gelingt es Yugi, Slifer den Himmelsdrachen aufzurufen, aber bevor er Kaiba damit besiegen kann, bringt dieser Obelisk den Peiniger ins Spiel. Allem Anschein nach ist Obelisk starker als Slifer ….

programme.title: Duell im Kolosseum (3)
programme.desc: Kaiba und Yugi kampfen mit ihren agyptischen Gotterkarten einen erbitterten Kampf gegeneinander. Immer wieder gelingt es Yugi seinen Kopf aus der Schlinge zu ziehen. Plotzlich zeigen sich die uralten Krafte des alten Ägypten. Monitore zerspringen und der Himmel erstrahlt in einem grellen Leuchten.

programme.title: Duell im Kolosseum (4)
programme.desc: Der Kampf der beiden Gottermonster lasst Kaiba und Yami-Yugi eine Reise in die Zeit des antiken Ägypten machen. Dort sehen sie, wie der alte Pharao und der Hexenmeister sich in einem Kampf gegenuberstehen. Trotz dieser gemeinsamen Vision leugnet Kaiba jeglichen Zusammenhang des gegenwartigen Duells mit der Vergangenheit. Durch einen geschickten Spielzug von Kaiba, verliert Yugi bei einem Angriff seines Schwarzen Magiers 1500 Lebenspunkte und ist damit in der Defensive

programme.title: Duell im Kolosseum (5)
programme.desc: Kaiba wird wahrend des Duells immer starker und hat schlieSSlich drei WeiSSe Drachen mit eiskaltem Blick auf dem Feld. In seinem Traum verliert Joey das Duell, erscheint aber in einer ausweglosen Situation in Yugis Gedanken und gibt ihm einen Rat, der ihn vor der Niederlage bewahrt. Es sieht so aus, als wurde Joey wieder zu sich kommen...

programme.title: Duell im Kolosseum (6)
programme.desc: Kaiba gewinnt immer mehr die Oberhand. Er hat drei weiSSe Drachen auf dem Feld und einen auf dem Kartenfriedhof. Beide wahlen drei Karten, die in ihrem Deck verbleiben. Der Rest wandert ebenfalls auf den Friedhof. Kaiba scheint unbesiegbar. Yugi glaubt seine Strategie zu erkennen und richtet seine drei verbleibenden Karten darauf aus, dass Kaiba mit Hilfe einer Fusionskarte seine drei weiSSen zu einem Ultradrachen vereinigen will. Durch eine geschickte Taktik gewinnt Yugi das Halbfinale

programme.title: Joey gegen Kaiba (1)
programme.desc: Nachdem Kaiba verloren hat, wird er von Joey zu einem Kampf um den dritten Platz herausgefordert. Nur widerwillig und auSSerst uberheblich lasst sich Kaiba auf das Duell ein. Wider Erwarten verliert er bei der ersten groSSen Schlacht 200 Lebenspunkte. Marik, das heiSSt die gute Seite von Marik, erscheint seiner Schwester Ishizu in Gestalt von Tea und beschlieSSt, sich seinen Korper zuruckzuholen und sich in den Kampf um die Rettung der Welt einzumischen.

programme.title: Joey gegen Kaiba (2)
programme.desc: Nachdem Joey nur noch mittelstarke Monster auf seiner Hand und in seinem Deck hat, gewinnt Kaiba immer weiter die Oberhand. Als er den WeiSSen Drachen mit Eiskaltem Blick aufruft, scheint das Spiel fur Joey verloren. Doch es gelingt ihm, Kaiba seinen WeiSSen abzuknopfen. Rasend vor Zorn ruft Kaiba einen zweiten WeiSSen Drachen auf’s Feld und lasst beide gegeneinander kampfen. Nachdem beide vernichtet sind, belebt Kaiba mit Monster Reborn seinen Drachen wieder neu.

programme.title: Joey gegen Kaiba (3)
programme.desc: Joey schlagt sich wacker gegen Kaiba, verliert aber letztendlich doch das Duell. Kurz bevor das Finale losgeht, entschlieSSt sich Kaiba, Yugi die einzige Karte zu geben, mit der er den Geflugelten Drachen des Ra schlagen kann. Allerdings muss er sie auf eine ganz besondere Art spielen, sonst hat er das Duell verloren.

programme.title: Yugi gegen Marik (1)
programme.desc: Das Finale beginnt. Yami-Marik kampft gegen Yami-Yugi. Wenn Yami-Yugi verliert, werden Mai und Yugi im Reich der Schatten versinken. Wenn Yami-Marik verliert, wird Marik in die Finsternis verdammt. Ein teuflisch genialer Plan von Yami-Marik. Es gelingt Yami-Yugi, Slifer den Himmelsdrachen aufzurufen, aber gleich darauf ruft Yami-Marik den Geflugelten Drachen des Ra auf. Und zwar in seinem unverwundbaren Phoenixmodus.

programme.title: Yugi gegen Marik (2)
programme.desc: Marik kontrolliert das Duell dank seiner agyptischen Gotterkarte, der Geflugelte Drache des Ra. Yami-Yugi vertraut Kaiba und scheint damit alte Energien freizusetzen. Blind zieht er die Karte, die Kaiba ihm gegeben hat und mit ihrer Hilfe kann er Obelisk den Peiniger aufrufen. Ist Yami-Marik jetzt am Ende? Fortsetzung folgt.

programme.title: Yugi gegen Marik (3)
programme.desc: Yami-Yugi greift mit Obelisk dem Peiniger an, doch Yami-Marik schafft mit einem Schleimmonster ein Ebenbild von Obelisk. Es gelingt ihm mit einigen Tricks, seine Lebenspunkte absolut unangreifbar zu machen. Die gute Seite von Marik verabschiedet sich von Odion, bevor sie fur immer im Reich der Schatten versinkt. Da erwacht Odion aus seinem Koma.

programme.title: Flashback
programme.desc: Tea fuhrt Serenity durch ihre Heimatstadt Domino und sie besuchen noch einmal die Orte, an denen die wichtigen Duelle stattfanden. Dabei kommen die Erinnerungen bis hin zum Battle City Finale. Dann heiSSt es Abschied nehmen.

programme.title: A New Evil, Part 1
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! And, as if things couldn’t get any worse, real monsters begin to appear around the world, terrorizing the population!

programme.title: A New Evil, Part 2
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters on the field at once, but each creature receives a power boost!

programme.title: Legend of the Dragons
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse!

programme.title: The Creator Returns
programme.desc: Confusion abound when enemies become friends... and friends become enemies! Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they’re asked for help from a one-eyed former foe!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 1
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Wielding his newest whacked-out Toon terrors, Pegasus is ready to repeat his previous victory against Kaiba!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 2
programme.desc: Not only does Alister’s mighty fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba’s monsters!

programme.title: An Unexpected Enemy
programme.desc: On the way to Industrial Illusions, Yugi and friends are ambushed by a band of motorcycle thugs - until their favorite friend soars to the rescue!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 1
programme.desc: Can this be?! Mai has joined the enemy! Wielding the sinister sorcery of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai unequivocally calculates to trap Joey’s soul for Dartz’s malevolent master plan!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 2
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the arcane abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies into devastating combat formations!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 3
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer?

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world’s chaotic conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and a lost civilization!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: The Final Journey
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel... Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: The time of destiny is now! Yugi vs. Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Not only does Atem still have all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn’t have a single monster on the field!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem – more than friends, closer than brothers.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Seeing his father carded in front of his eyes, Yuyas rage reaches a boiling point as he accepts Yuris challenge. But not only does he have to contend with Yugo and Yuris dragons, but Zarcs ever growing influence over him.

programme.title: Time to Reunite!
programme.desc: The four dimensions start to fuse together as Yuya continues to struggle against Yuri. Forced to discard his trump card, things seem hopeless. Yuyas friends then arrive to encourage him to keep fighting no matter what.

programme.title: A Most Brutal Duel
programme.desc: Yuya absorbs all of his counterparts and reclaimed his true form as Supreme King Z-ARC. Starting to lay waste to the Fusion Dimension, Sora and Edo challenge Zarc to try and reach out to Yuyas spirit.

programme.title: A Dark Summoning
programme.desc: The four dimensions continue to unite as Zarc effortlessly crushes Sora and Edo. Kaito and Shun continue the fight against Zarc while people from Heartland and Neo Domino City start appearing in the Fusion Dimension.

programme.title: Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Gongenzaka and Jack fight against Zarc next, trying their best to reach out to Yuyas soul buried in Zarcs darkness. A revived Crow and Sawatari decide to join in when Zarcs Supreme King Dragons swarm the field.

programme.title: Clash Talk
programme.desc: Crow notices that Zarc is starting to lose his composure, leading him and Sawatari to up their game against Zarcs dragons. As dimensional integration is getting closer to completion, Reiji tries to convince his dad to stop Zarc.

programme.title: A Ray of Hope
programme.desc: Rays soul possesses Reira so she can battle against Zarc alongside Reiji. Zarc boasts that he is the creator of Pendulum Summon, but Ray is determined to stop him once and for all using the four natural energy cards.

programme.title: Swinging Back into Action
programme.desc: Things have seemingly returned to normal in the Pendulum Dimension, but Yuya gets the feeling that something is missing. Reiji has him duel against Tsukikage to restore his memories and make him finish the Lancers goal for good.

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 1
programme.desc: The hunt for the Mythyrian Numbers leads our heroes to the peak of a perilous mountain where Kite’s skills are put to the test by a dragon-wielding Number Guardian!

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Furry Fury
programme.desc: After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there’s more to Girag than meets the eye – like a red nose and whiskers!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 1
programme.desc: It’s rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle beneath the ocean reaches new depths of danger when Shark comes face to face with the Number Guardian, Abyss!

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 1
programme.desc: Earth and Astral World are under attack! Yuma and Astral are the only ones who can stop it, but saving their planets may come at the ultimate price…

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between our two heroes and Number 96 comes to a shocking conclusion that leaves only one person standing!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone’s stealing memories, and the Super Secret Numbers Club are going to find out who! But when the hunters become the hunted, Yuma’s friends quickly realize that they need help from an exterminator!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Trey team up to take down a bugged out Barian who likes to munch on memories! Can Yuma and Trey swat down this winged menace before he swoops in to drain their brains?

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 1
programme.desc: With Vector’s patience for failure fading fast, Mr. Heartland begs for a final chance to beat Yuma! Desperate to deliver, Heartland deploys his most dangerous duelist to date, a treacherous Barian armed with toxic tentacles!

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 2
programme.desc: Shark and Quattro struggle to keep their heads above water as they battle the Barian duelist from the deep, Chironex!

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s all set to travel across the stars to save Astral, but an unexpected pest pops by to plunder Yuma’s plans!

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch! But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner’s attacks!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 4
programme.desc: With Astral’s fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World’s Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 1
programme.desc: To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers. When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang’s heels!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 2
programme.desc: With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down! Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?

programme.title: Battle with the Barians
programme.desc: When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!

programme.title: Fight for a Friend
programme.desc: Quattro faces off against the Barian leader, Nash! Hoping to find Shark swimming just beneath his new Barian identity, Quattro looks to hook his old friend and reel him back in!

programme.title: Farewell for a Friend
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Nash and Quattro comes to a climactic conclusion! Will this battle lure the real Shark out from inside his Barian form, or will it cost Quattro much more than he ever could have imagined?

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 1
programme.desc: Looking to get revenge for their brother Quattro, Trey and Quinton team up to take down the treacherous Barian, Mizar!

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 2
programme.desc: As Quinton and Treys devastating double duel against Mizar flares to a feverish finish, the brothers reveal the real reason they are battling the Barian! Their startling secret hits Mizar harder than any attack!

programme.title: The Heart of the Cards
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi’s Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: The Gauntlet Is Thrown
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa’s soul as his prize!

programme.title: Journey to the Duelist Kingdom
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister’s eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi’s deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Into The Hornets Nest
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they’ve ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he’s to survive!

programme.title: The Ultimate Great Moth
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil’s first wave of Duel Monsters, Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power every turn! Can Yugi find a way to destroy this winged beast before it destroys him?

programme.title: First Duel
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai’s secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Attack from the Deep
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Everythings Relative
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp’s crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba’s brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother’s company!

programme.title: Duel With a Ghoul
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba. But with his best cards resting at the bottom of the ocean, Yugi must discover a new strategy to survive fake Kaiba’s powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Give up the Ghost
programme.desc: Yugi defeats Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: The Dueling Monkey
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends’ help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own. But as Rex Raptor’s relentless dinos destroys Joey’s best Duel Monsters, will Tristan’s card remind him that with his friends, he is never alone in battle?

programme.title: Trial by Red-Eyes
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Joey must figure out the secret of Yugi’s gift, the Time Wizard card, without Yugi’s help or he’s taking the next boat out of Duelist Kingdom!

programme.title: Evil Spirit of the Ring
programme.desc: Yugi’s classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring’s dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves! Not only must Yugi battle to avoid becoming a permanent part of the card game, but also free Bakura’s soul from the Millennium Ring’s control!

programme.title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel
programme.desc: Pegasus’s hired duelist PaniK cheats Mai of all her Star Chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when PaniK’s Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Hamara Dil Aapke Paas Hai
programme.desc: When Preeti testifies against Bhavani Choudhry for a murder, he rapes her. After being humiliated and thrown out by her family, Avinash, a kind man, offers her a place to stay.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E55 Jodha Akbar S3 E55
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: While en route to prison, a stray bullet strikes the notorious crime boss Cobra, setting off a chain of events that forces small-time crook brothers Tara and Sitara to flee from the police. During their escape, they unexpectedly find refuge at the home of Major Ram Singh, a tough and disciplined Border Security Force officer. To their surprise, they also find love—Tara falls for Rams charming sister Pinki, while Sitara is smitten by her best friend Priti. Meanwhile, Cobra is far from defeated; he’s already plotting to break his ruthless brother Panther out of Ram Singh’s jail. But what happens when Tara and Sitara’s true identities are exposed? Can they redeem themselves and help bring...

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E266 King of Hearts S1 E266
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E266 Second Chances S1 E266
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E60 Jodha Akbar S3 E60
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E266 Undercover Love S1 E266
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.
